11.content:
Note: This story is set during the fourth season of the show.

The sun rose in Smallville, Kansas, as another day began. Clark Kent, adopted son of Jonathan and Martha Kent, and secretly the last son of the destroyed planet of Krypton - made his way out of the Kent family home, and headed into the barn on the farm his family owned. To everyone else, Clark was just an ordinary high school kid, only his parents knew the truth about his origins and amazing powers...powers that came in handy on a farm.

To anyone else, heavy lifting on a farm might have seemed like a rather extreme chore, but to Clark, it was a pretty easy, and sometimes relaxing, way to start the day. In fact, Clark never really considered them to be 'chores' at all - he was happy to help his father out on the farm in whatever way he could, and considering he possessed super strength, speed and agility, he could hardly complain that it would eat up his free time. He usually finished things up pretty quick.

Clark grabbed a large bail of hay with one arm - it was about twice his size, but seemed light as a feather in his hands. He slung it over his shoulder and carried it out of the barn and into the vast field that his family owned. He placed the bail of hay down on the ground, and headed back for another one, passing by his father on the way back into the barn.

"Morning son," Jonathan Kent said, yawning tiredly and walking beside Clark as they headed into the barn. "Your up early today, usually I'm the first one out."

"Early bird catches the worm Dad," Clark smiled. "At least, that's what Lex always says."

"Well, I'm sure the Luthors catch plenty of worms..." Jonathan mumbled to himself.

Clark decided to change the subject. "Any chance I can get a lift into school Dad?" Clark asked.

Jonathan shook his head. "Sorry son," he said. "No can do. I have to head into Metropolis early...in fact, I'm late already, but you know what your mothers like - she thinks I need my sleep after the heart attack."

"She's right," said Clark. "You should still be taking it easy."

"Now don't you start," Jonathan said, pulling out his keys and walking towards his large, red truck.

Jonathan clambered into the Kent family truck, and drove off down the dusty field road, waving a quick goodbye to Clark.

Clark lifted another bail of hay, possibly even larger than the last one, and continued doing this until he had carried out about a dozen hay bails into the field. It was all pretty simple work for him, and he barely even caught a sweat doing it. Clark checked the time, and realized he was going to be late for school if he didn't hurry - despite getting up early, he had still managed to wind up late.

Clark pulled on his red jacket, hastily gathered up his school books and loaded them into his rucksack, and set off down the road, at which point he decided to avoid being late by using his super speed to run into town - while his parents did not like him using his powers in broad daylight, his super speed was so fast that nobody would ever see him anyway.

As he was about to speed away, Clark spotted something at the of the road...

As his stomach continued to rumble, Clark yanked open another cupboard, nearly pulling the door of it's hinges in his haste - inside this cupboard was the breakfast cereal's.

Being the first good food he had found, Clark couldn't wait to get them into his mouth. Tearing open the bag, Clark tilted his head back and tipped the box up. Crunchy, dry cereal fell from the box into his mouth, and he began chomping down, swallowing each mouth full of cereal as quickly as he could. He soon realised that cereal wasn't really going to fill him up, so he put the box pack, wiped the crumbs from around his mouth, and continued his search.

Suddenly, something caught Clark's eye. On top of the grill was a saucepan with a note attached to it, Clark snatched the note up and read it - Leftover sausages and bacon, help yourselves.

"Jackpot..." Clark said out loud, grabbing the pan and opening it up to find a large batch of sausages and bacon his Mom must have left from this morning, they were still a little warm.

Clark pulled a chair out from the table and placed the pan down. As he sat down, he felt his stomach bulge out further, he had almost forgotten that he had unbuttoned his pants earlier. He would have worried about his girth, but right now, he just wanted to eat. And so, he began.

Clark ate like he had never eaten before, grabbing sausages from the pan with his bare hands, devouring each one in a few bites, pushing them into his mouth and gulping them down greedily. Every time he finished one sausage, Clark's now greasy fingers reached for another, and pushed it into his mouth - he barely even had time to enjoy the taste of the food, all he cared about was satisfying his hunger.

In about ten minutes, Clark had devoured everything in the pan, and it seemed as though his binge had satisfied his rumbling stomach. He no longer felt starving, and his stomach was not in any pain - his mission had been accomplished. However, his feeling of hunger had now been replaced with one of bloating - Clark didn't know how many sausages had been in the pan, but he knew there had been a lot, much more than any one person should eat in one sitting.

"URRRRRRP!" A loud belch escaped Clark's mouth, and he gave a groan of discomfort as he felt his bloated stomach press against his jeans.

Clark looked down, and saw that his stomach was even larger than it had been earlier. He gave an annoyed groan, as he realised what a pig he had made of himself. His T shirt had ridden up even further, well above his belly button, to just underneath his pecs, exposing his large, bloated, perfectly round belly.

Clark placed a hand on his stomach, and found that it was no longer feeling flabby, but very hard. It was a more enjoyable feeling, making him feel just bloated, instead of flabby. As he continued to rub his swollen gut, he realised his pants were still unbuttoned, though he couldn't actually see anything past his protruding stomach at this point. None the less, despite knowing he had overdone it with the food, and that he must now look like a complete pig, Clark was completely satisfied.

Suddenly, Clark heard a noise...
1111211211.title: Satisfaction

choices: It was Chloe...
It was Lana...
11112112111.content:
There was the sound of footsteps, and Clark could hear someone approaching the door. TThey were beginning to turn the handle, and Clark was beginning to panic. He stood up as quickly as he could, and was almost dragged down by the weight of his overstuffed belly. Taken back a little by the heavy feeling in his stomach, Clark stumbled clumsily, knocking over his chair, which fell to the floor with a loud clatter.

He had hoped to get out of the room and hide out, but the person at the door would have heard that noise. There was no getting out of this one, whoever was at the door was going to open it and see his exposed belly staring back at them.

The door slowly opened, and Clark stared ahead nervously, wondering who was about to walk in...
11112112111.title: Who is it?

choices: Clark goes out and fetches the Meteor Rock...
Chloe goes out and fetches the Meteor Rock...
111121121111.content:
Clark saw the familiar figure of Chloe Sullivan framed in the doorway. Their eyes met, and Chloe smiled warmly. Clark smiled back awkwardly, hoping, for one desperate moment, that Chloe hadn't noticed anything wrong, but Chloe's smile was soon replaced with a look of absolute shock as her eyes moved down Clark's body and nearly popped out of her head as she saw his bloated stomach bulging out from under his shirt.

Clark tried to tug his T-shirt down, but it was useless at this point, his entire belly had gotten so bloated that the shirt refused to cover anything below his pectorals, and that wasn't going to change any time soon. Clark turned a deep shade of red as Chloe gawked at him.

"Clark...what the-," Chloe couldn't get her words out, and simply stared at Clark's stomach in amazement.

"Chloe," Clark said, still tugging a little at his shirt awkwardly. "This isn't what it looks like..."

"Sorry for being so blunt," Chloe interrupted him. "But...how the hell did you get so huge? If I didn't know any better I'd say Smallville was having it's first male pregnancy...wait...it's not...is it?"

"Of course not!" Clark said dismissively, although the real explanation wasn't going to be any more believable. "I touched some strange meteor rock I found outside, and it made me grow..."

"Grow in what way?" Chloe asked.

"Do you really need to ask?" Clark said, gesturing to his over-sized stomach.

"Well, I mean, did it just make your belly blow up like a balloon?" Chloe said.

"I'm not sure...I mean, my stomach got a lot bigger, but I'm not sure about the rest of me," Clark explained, feeling very awkward talking to Chloe about this. "I think the meteor rock caused me to gain weight, all over."

"Are your clothes tight?" Chloe asked.

Clark gave her an odd look.

Chloe sighed. "Clark, I know you probably don't want to talk about your growing pains with me right now, but we need to figure out exactly what's happening here."

"I know, your right," Clark conceded. "Yeah, my clothes are tight pretty much all over."

"Looks like you found the miracle grow meteor rock," Chloe grinned, but Clark did not return her smile. "Well, do you still have the rock?"

Clark thought back, and realised he had left the Kryptonite outside, having dropped and forgotten about it during his initial growth. He wasn't sure he wanted to go near it again, and he didn't think Chloe going near it was such a good idea either.

"I dropped it outside where I found it," Clark told Chloe. "Got kind of distracted when my stomach started blowing up 'like a balloon'."

Chloe nodded. "I should go and get it."

"No!" Clark exclaimed. "You shouldn't go near it, the second I touched it I started changing."

"So you got this big after touching it just once?" Chloe asked in amazement.

"Well...actually..." Clark looked down at the remains of his meal on the table. "I got a little hungry and got carried away down here. Chloe, I'd never felt so hungry in my life. I've never eaten so much."

Chloe was still staring at Clark's bulging belly. "I believe you," she said. "So, you think when your stomach grew so did you appetite?"

"Sounds about right," Clark nodded in agreement.
111121121111.title: Chloe finds out

choices: Clark begins to grow again...
Clark shrinks back to normal...
1111211211111.content:
"Right," Chloe said. "What are we going to do about this rock, we can't just leave it there for someone else to find."

Clark nodded. Chloe was right of course, though he didn't want to touch the Kryptonite again. It was best to take precautions this time round. Clark walked across the room and pulled open a draw, and reached in to take out one of his Dad's work gloves.

"Good idea," Chloe said, seeing Clark put the glove on. "You don't want to get any fatter."

Clark turned to Chloe and raised an eyebrow.

"Sorry, didn't mean to call you...you know," Chloe apologized.

Clark, accepting the apology silently, headed outside to the spot where he had dropped the Kryptonite. He saw it, on the floor, glistening in the sunlight, and bent down to pick it up. His whole center of gravity shifted as he bent over, his belly nearly dragging him down. It was, by far the biggest part of his body now. Despite the difficulty imposed on him by his new size, Clark picked up the rock and headed back inside, where he placed it down on the table as quickly as he could, fearing that it might start affecting him if he held it for any longer.

Chloe peered in for a closer look. "Hmm, definitely a meteor rock."

"Don't get too close," Clark said. "We don't know how it works."

Chloe backed away, and case a sideways glance at Clark. Clark knew she was looking at his lower half, but tried to act like everything was normal. However, he could hear Chloe trying to stop herself from laughing.

"All right," Clark sighed. "I know, it's funny, I've got a pot belly. Can we get serious already?"

"It's not that," Chloe giggled. "Clark...did you know your pants were open?"

Clark went bright red once again. He had completely forgotten that his pants were open, mainly because he couldn't see past his belly anymore. He had unbuttoned them himself to relieve some of pressure around his waist, which had seemed like a good idea at the time, but he doubted buttoning them up was a possibility at this point. None the less, he gave it a go, reaching down and trying to re button his pants. He quickly realized that it was no use, his stomach was too big and bloated to allow it. He could try and suck it in, but right now, with his stomach stuffed full of food, he doubted it would make much difference.

"Let's just get to work on a solution," Clark said.

Clark and Chloe leaned in to look at the rock, when suddenly, Clark began to feel strange...
1111211211111.title: Rock Retrieval

choices: Clark suggests asking Lex for help...
Clark wants to stay hidden and do some exercise...
11112112111111.content:
Clark felt a strange warmth spread throughout his body, the exact same warmth he had felt when he had first touched the yellow Kryptonite.

"Oh no..." Clark said aloud, staring down at his bloated pot belly in apprehension.

"What is it?" Chloe asked. "Are you okay?"

"Before I...grew...before, there was this weird feeling," Clark explained.

Chloe looked down at Clark's exposed stomach, backing away a little. "So?"

Clark shifted uncomfortably, not really sure what was about to happen. He touched the sides of his engorged belly, and rubbed them absent mindedly. "I'm getting that feeling again," he said.

"Uh oh," Chloe muttered, fixated on Clark's exposed gut.

"Ugh..." Clark gave a grunt as he felt a tingling in his stomach, and suddenly, his stomach began to feel much lighter. The bloated feeling he had gotten from his feast seemed to disappear all at once, and suddenly, Clark felt a lot lighter. "Hey...that wasn't so bad!" Clark said excitedly, smiling across at Chloe.

"Erm...Clark...maybe you should pay closer attention to your stomach?" Chloe said awkwardly.

"Huh?"

Clark looked down, and staggered back a little as he saw his stomach growing even larger. He backed away from the table, and propped himself up against the fridge door, arching his back slightly in order to get a better view of his swelling stomach. His hands were still clutching the sides of his rapidly inflating gut, feeling the quick and steady bulging of flesh beneath his fingertrips as his stomach pushed out further and further.

But it wasn't only his belly that was growing; Clark could feel his legs thickening within his jeans, which were becoming incredibly tight across his widening legs. His arms also seemed to be gaining weight, and the sleeves of his T shirt stretched to constrain his biceps. Biceps which, Clark was sure, were swelling with fat, rather than muscle.

"Oh my God, Clark...your blowing up like a balloon!" Chloe gasped in shock and awe as she watched Clark's transformation.

Clark blushed, having almost forgotten that Chloe was in the room with him. Getting fat was embarrassing enough without it happening instantly with his best friend looking at him like he was a freak. Luckily, the growth now seemed to be slowing down. While Clark felt as though his clothes were dangerously close to ripping off his body, he couldn't feel his arms and legs pushing against the material of his clothing anymore, and his stomach didn't seem to be getting any bigger. It looked as though his latest growth spurt was over.

"I think it's stopped," Clark sighed.

Chloe nodded. "Yeah...I think so too..."

Clark pushed himself away from the fridge, and felt his fat jiggle as his body moved forward. The weight he had just gained had made his body a lot more flabby. He might have passed himself off as simply being incredibly bloated before, but nobody would buy that story now - his stomach had developed several rolls of fat, which shook when he walked. His belly sagged down, bulging over the rim of his jeans like the top of a giant muffin. His thighs rubbed together as he walked, and he could feel a slight jiggle beneath his now completely useless T shirt. His pecs had fattened up too, he guessed.

"Clark, you must have gained about fifty pounds just now!" Chloe exclaimed.

Clark waddled towards her, still adjusting to his new size, and the strain it was putting on his body. He could barely walk in his skin tight jeans. "Chloe, I need to get away from that rock, do you think you could hide it somewhere for me?"

"Me?" Chloe gasped, looking at the rock fearfully. "What if I start growing too?"

Clark sighed, but he knew Chloe was right. He had already been exposed, and he didn't know what effect the Kryptonite might have on Chloe. He grabbed the garden glove again, and waddled out of the room, taking his steps slowly and carefully, so as to not damage his clothes, or cause too much jiggling of his chubby belly. Chloe followed him into the barn, where Clark pulled out a small, secure metal box, and popped the rock inside, closing it up and hiding it in a drawer.

"What now?" Chloe asked.
11112112111111.title: Return of the flab

choices: Clark and Chloe make it to the Luthor mansion without incident...
Clark starts to grow again on the way to Lex...
111121121111111.content:
Clark had to take a moment to stop and breathe, at which point he leant up against one of the wooden columns in the barn and sighed, wondering what he was going to do. He wasn't exactly comfortable around Chloe, so he knew he wasn't going to go to Lana or Lois about this, and he wasn't ready to face his parents yet (he had no doubt they would be furious he had even gone near that Kryptonite). That left him with pretty much one choice: Lex Luthor.

"Chloe, I think I'm going to need to go to Lex with this," Clark said.

Chloe shook her head dubiously. "I don't know about this Clark," she said. "Are you really sure you can trust him? What if he makes you into some lab experiment?"

Clark shook his head. "He's not some mad scientist Chloe," he said. "He might have something that can help to reverse this..."

Chloe still looked concerned. "Well, if your going to do this, then I'm going with you."

"Chloe, you don't have to if you don't want to," Clark assured her.

"Clark," Chloe said firmly, looking him straight in the eye. "I'm coming, whether you like it or not."

Clark nodded. Once Chloe made up her mind, there was no way of changing it. "Right, we better get going," he said.

Clark pushed his chubby body off of the wooden pole and began to slowly make his way out of the barn. With each step, his round, bloated middle shook gently, and his undersized clothes strained against his new physique.

"Uh...Clark?" Chloe said from behind him.

Clark twisted his neck around to face her, feeling how some fat had become to accumulate under his chin. "What is it?"

"Maybe you should change into something...different..." Chloe said awkwardly.

Clark blushed, and stared down at his bulging belly. He looked completely ridiculous; if he went out like this then he might wind up on Chloe's 'wall of weird'. "Okay, I'll see if I've got something bigger. Why don't you go wait outside?"

Chloe nodded and made her way out of the barn, as Clark walked up the stairs to his room. The stairs creaked with each step he took, and he certain they were going to give in at any moment and send him crashing to the floor...but, by some miracle, they held out. After checking Chloe was out of sight, Clark began to undress. It took little effort to remove his T-shirt, which had only served to cover his now flabby pecs. He pictured Lois taunting him about having 'man boobs' when he next saw her. He knew she would not go easy on him.

His pants presented more of a challenge. With the growth of his legs, they had become plastered onto his body, and as he tried to pull them down, he couldn't get them to move a muscle. He would have had no trouble with this normally - but for some reason, it seemed as though he had gotten weaker. Perhaps the fat he had gained had begun to make his muscles disappear completely? Clark began to worry, but he was distracted by a loud tearing noise from below his waist. In his struggle to remove his pants, he had torn them completely.

Clark sighed as the tattered remains of his jeans fell to the ground, and he removed the last remnants of his once perfect fitting pants. Now dressed only in his boxer shorts, which had also grown incredibly tight around his flabbier ass, Clark shuffled into view of the mirror and stared at his reflection. Even he was surprised at how big he looked. His stomach was his largest attribute, sticking out a good foot from his body like the belly of a heavily pregnant woman. It sagged down slightly, but otherwise seemed quite round and firm, all things considered. His once muscled biceps had melted into chubby, flabby arms, and his legs had thickened like small tree trunks. Surprisingly, his face didn't seem to have changed at all, aside from a little fullness around his cheeks. He was grateful for that at least, he still looked like himself.

The problem now was finding some clothes that would fit him. He waddled over to his wardrobe and pulled it open, everything looked far too small for him, but he spotted a large football jersey his Dad had given him a few years back, which had been about ten sizes too big for him at the time, and was still pretty big looking now by the looks of it. Clark pulled out the jersey, which had a large number '8' on the front, and pulled it on over his head. It hid his girth pretty well, far better than he had expected. Even now, the football jersey fit him loosely.

He took a pair of sweat pants and pulled them on, their elastic wasitband was stretched to it's limit, but it would have to do. At least he was covered up. He straightened his clothes, and carefully went back downstairs, and outside to Chloe...
111121121111111.title: Changing clothes

choices: Take Lex's offer, and try out the new fat reducing machine...
Decline Lex's offer, it sounds too risky...
1111211211111111.content:
"Okay, let's go," said Clark.

Chloe nodded, and they set off down the path.

"I called in to school and told them we'd both be off sick," Chloe said.

"How'd you manage that?" Clark asked curiously.

"Les just say I have a talent for impersonation, and I do a mean Martha Kent," Chloe grinned.

Clark raised an eyebrow, but asked no further questions; he was having some difficulty in adjusting to his new size; with each step he took, he felt the added layers of flab on his body jiggle. It was a completely new sensation for him, having been in good shape all his life. He was also aware of the fact that he was walking much slower than normal, and he was certain that Chloe was having to slow her pace in order to walk alongside him.

"So, how does it feel?" Chloe suddenly asked, breaking the silence.

"How does what feel?" Clark asked, feeling his thighs rub together.

"You know...having a different...uh...body shape..." Chloe replied awkwardly, trying to avoid staring at Clark's plump middle.

Clark sighed. "You mean, what's it like being fat?"

Chloe blushed. "Sorry, guess that was kinda blunt, huh?"

Clark managed a smile. "It's okay Chloe," he said softly. "It feels weird, that much I know...it's hard to get used to, all this weight doesn't exactly stay still."

"Well, I think you're coping with it really well Clark," Chloe smiled. "I know I'd be having a major freak out right now if it was me. I wouldn't even leave my room, let alone walk to Lex Luthor's."

Clark smiled back, and tried to stay positive as he and Chloe continued the walk to the Luthor mansion. As his weight gain had been caused by exposure to Kryptonite, Clark was sure that it could be reversed somehow, after all, none of the other Kryptonite he had encountered, even red, had ever had irreversible effects...

---

After what seemed like an eternity for Clark - who was used to racing around town faster than a speeding bullet - he and Chloe finally reached the Mansion. Clark walked up to the security guards at the front gates, who usually let him go in straight away, but today, they blocked his path.

"What's your business here?" The first security guard asked.

"I'm here to see Lex," Clark replied.

"Mister Luthor doesn't just see anybody, kid," the second security guard snapped, looking Clark up and down.

"Guys, it's me, Clark, you've never stopped me going in before," Clark protested, but he suspected that he knew the cause of their reluctance - they didn't recognise him.

The two guards leaned in to get a closer look at Clark, and their eyes opened in realization.

"Woah..." The first guard said.

"Sorry about that," said the second. "I...uh...didn't recognise you for a second...go on in, kid."

Clark, who was more than a little embarrassed, pushed past the two guards, with Chloe hurrying after him. Obviously, they hadn't recognised him with the extra weight. Suddenly, Clark felt a lot more concerned about his appearance.

"Woah! That kid has piled on the pounds!" One of the guards exclaimed from behind Clark and Chloe.

"Tell me about it, how did he let himself go like that?" Said the other.

"That might at least have waited until we were out of earshot! Jerks..." Chloe said angrily. "You okay Clark?

Clark sighed. "Yeah, I'm fine...come on, it's this way."

They turned a corner, and walked into Lex's office. Clark felt his belly brush against the doors as he pushed them open. As he and Chloe entered the room, Lex rose from his desk.

"Clark, Chloe, security told me you were on your way..." Lex trailed off as he saw Clark.

"Lex, I have a problem," Clark said, deciding to cut to the chase, and avoid anymore awkwardness.

"Right..." Lex said, still staring at Clark in confusion. "Forgive me for stating the obvious Clark, but does your problem have anything to do with the fact that you've put on about one hundred pounds since I saw you last week?"

Clark exchanged a nervous look with Chloe. He knew it was a little risky coming to Lex with this, but it wasn't like he could hide it for much longer anyway. He would have to tell Lex what happened, although he might have to leave out a few details...

"Lex, I touched this strange rock..." Clark began, trying to sound as ignorant as possible. "And I started swelling up...I think it might have been one of the meteor rocks..."

Lex suddenly looked a lot more intrigued. "Really? Where's this rock now?"

Clark shifted awkwardly, and decided to change the subject. "I put it some place safe...Lex, the reason I came to you was that I was wondering if Luthorcorp might have anything that could reverse this."

Lex considered for a moment, and the beginnings of a smile crossed his face. "You know Clark, I might just have something...Luthorcorp have been working on a way to eliminate the fat within a persons body."

"Kinda like an instant weight loss?" Chloe asked.

"Exactly," Lex said. "Purely for health purposes, of course."

"Of course..." Chloe muttered.

"Does it work?" Clark asked.

"It hasn't been tested yet, but if you want to be our first test subject, you're welcome," Lex said. "Aside from that, there's nothing I can do, except recommend a good dietician."

Clark considered the offer...
1111211211111111.title: To the Mansion

choices: Appears unfazed, he has a clear explanation for all of this
Is terrified! he has no idea what is going on!
11112112111111111.content:
After thinking it over for a few moments, Clark replied, "Let's try it out!" He was so preoccupied with his...embarrassing situation that he did not think about what effects his meteor rock exposure, or him being an alien for that matter, would have on the procedure.

Lex smiled, "Let's get down to it then. My lab assistant will be notified and will be waiting for you in the lab when we arrive there. The machine should be prepped by then." With that, Lex took out his cell phone and promptly barked orders to his scientists working in the lab at LutherCorp. After that, it only took a few minutes of very rapid driving in one of Lex's muscle cars to get them to the laboratory,,,where the machine awaited Clark.

The head technician rushed to greet Lex, and his two guests. He did not want to mess up the PR with the fat reducing machine's first test subject, especially when the boss was around. He took one look at Clark and told Mr. Luthor, "The machine's max power setting is to be used for morbidly obese, bed bound patients, so we will just use the medium setting for your...", His voice trailed off in uncertainty,"friend here, if that's alright with you Mr. Luthor."

Lex smirked at his underling's nervousness, "That will be fine, is the machine ready for my friend?"

"Yes sir, but I'm afraid you can't be in the same room with him while he goes in for the procedure. He'll have to take off his clothes for that, and...privacy laws right?"

Lex nodded, "I'll be waiting in the next room with Miss Sullivan then. And Dr. Crusher..."

"Yes, sir?"

"Don't screw this up."

The frightened tech nodded, and lead a very embarrassed Clark to the testing center, then looked down and ordered him to strip down and lie down in the machine, which looked like a giant MRI scanner. He explained that he had to be in the room to make sure noting went wrong, though. Clark reluctantly complied. Unfortunately, the tech forgot to close the door between the waiting area and testing center until a few seconds after Clark had taken off his clothes. Fortunately, the tech remembered to close the door before Lex could notice. However, Chloe, quite accidentally, saw EVERYTHING. Embarrassed for her friend, and shocked at the sight of the front of Clark's enlarged naked body, she decided to say nothing. However, despite her shock at the sight of Clark's fat body, Chloe still felt strangely attracted to him. Apparently, her not-so-secret feelings for Clark would not go away even he was fat...

A few minute's later,Chloe's strange thought were cut off by the sound of Clark's screams from within the test area! Lex and Chloe quickly rushed in to find an even larger Clark Kent, whose fat thankfully covered all of his private areas. He was apparently too terrified to utter another sound.

"What have you done?!" Lex yells at the head scientist.

The head tech...
11112112111111111.title: Take Lex's offer

choices: Decide to blow Lana off again
Have the date at the Kent house
111121121111111111.content:
DR. Crusher quickly started to explain, "in a small number of the animal tests, the subject rapidly gained weight for a period of time, before the weight loss started kicking in, a funny little side effect really...", he trailed of at the sight of Lex and Chloe glaring at him, "...but it should only last 24-48 hours before he rapidly loses weight!", he quickly added.

Lex was not amused, "You better hope so, Dr. Crusher, otherwise this will be on your head! And if you EVER withhold information like that from me again, not only will you be fired, you will never work in this county ever again!"

The technician trembled in fear, "Yes sir.", he managed to squeak. Normally Chloe would have thought Lex's behaviour was uncalled for, but when it came to Clark, she could get a little overprotective too.

"Guys, what the heck just happened?", Clark finally managed to speak.

Chloe quickly filled Clark in on what Dr. Crusher, who had long since run out of the room in fear, believed was happening, then quickly added, "You better get some new clothes on, those old ones probably won't fit now..."
Clark looked done at his expanded form and nodded miserably, "then you'll need to tell your parents what happened, and probably Lana as well,"

Putting on the much larger clothes that Lex had ordered to be brought in the room while she and Lex looked away, Clark replied, "Why would I want to do that! Today is Friday, and my parents are going to be in Metropolis all weekend, the left me to take care of the house. They don't need to know about this! And I definitely don't want Lana to see me like this! I don't think she would like the fact that her new boyfriend put on over 100 pounds almost overnight!"

Chloe pondered this, then said,"well, I guess we don't have to tell your parents, but you should really trust Lana with this, I think she'll understand. Besides, you have a date with her tonight, and I don't think she'll appreciate you blowing her off AGAIN!'

Lex, who had been silent while Clark and Chloe had been conversing added, "Yeah, It's not a good idea to bail on a woman as often as you do Clark. I think Lana will appreciate it if you are honest with her." Lex smirked, "and I bet her initial reaction will be absolutely priceless!" When both Clark and Chloe glowered at him, he quickly added, "Sorry! I guess my sense of humour can get away from me sometimes. Let me make it up to you Clark, I can get you anything you want from a Big and Tall Catalogue, and a limo, with reservations to any restaurant in Smallville. That might help her take her mind off, well, you know." Lex made a nervous gesture toward Clark's fat form.

Clark sighed, "Thanks Lex, but I think I'll just...
111121121111111111.title: Bigger problems

choices: A shocked Lana runs from an expanding Clark, and Chloe comforts him
Lana calms down, and goes through with the date at the house

"I think I'll just have the date with Lana at my house. I don't want to blow her off again, but I do not want to be seen like this in public!" Clark almost shouted.

"Easy there. Clark! No one's forcing you to go anywhere!" Chloe replied, then added, "But I'm proud of your for doing the brave thing here. Let's get you out of this place, if Dr. Crusher is right, your body should go back to normal on its own within the next couple days."

Lex nodded in agreement, and the three walked out of the LutherCorp facility...

LATER THAT NIGHT...

Lana showed up at the Kent house, they had originally planned to go out to dinner, but Clark said he had something important to tell her. "I wonder what it could be," Lana thought out loud. Just as she was about to ring the doorbell, Clark opened the door, revealing his massive new body!

"What happened to you!?" Lana exclaimed in shock.

Clark was quick to respond, "Please just let me explain! It all started out when I found this glowing yellow rock on my way to school this morning..." Clark quickly recounted the days events for Lana, omitting some of the more embarrassing details. For a few uncomfortable seconds, Clark waited for Lana, who had been to shocked to speak, to respond.

Finally,..
1111211211111111112.title: Lana arrives

choices: Thanks Chloe for the clothes, and asks her to leave
Started to kiss Chloe
11112112111111111121.content:
Just as Lana was about to open her mouth, Clark felt an all too familiar sensation creep over his body. "Please not now!" Clark begged his body. but to no avail. Martha had a feeling those two would eventually get together, but never that it would be under such weird circumstances!

After the shock had worn off for the elder Kent's, Clark helped them get the heavier luggage from the truck, while Johnathan noted that Clark's strength seemed undiminished, despite the large amount of flab now present on his body! Chloe helped out with some of the lighter items, and the Kent's insisted that Clark's new girlfriend have dinner with them afterwards, Chloe, of course, accepted. Over dinner, it was decided that Clark would return to school tomorrow, as normal, and would tell the other students he had undergone a meteor-rock related mutation (which was an all to common occurrence in Smallville, and happened to be the truth).Clark reluctantly agreed, and Chloe assured Clark she would support him no matter how the other students reacted. The Kent's smiled, the were glad Clark had such chosen to date someone who would support him unconditionally. However, Martha still had one piece of business to take care of with Chloe...

Asking Chloe to help her with the dishes while Clark and Johnathon watched TV after dinner, Martha finally got the chance to talk to Chloe alone, and confront her with something she had discovered. "Chloe, when I was unpacking in Johnathon's and my room, I found something by the bedside table. I think it might be yours. Must have slipped off your ear while you were getting Clark set up in our room the other night!" Without another word, Martha placed Chloe's missing earring on the kitchen counter in front of Chloe as the blonde teen's eyes went wide in shock. The panicked look on Chloe's face was enough to confirm Martha's suspicions about what had already happened between Chloe and her son! Martha sighed, she supposed she should have been mad at the new couple for breaking the house rules (and in their bedroom no less!), but she figured Clark had been through enough traumatic experiences in the past few days, and didn't need to be punished for this as well, which was why she had not shared her suspicions with her husband. Furthermore, although she would never admit it, she was glad Chloe obviously "cared about" her son a great deal, through "thick or thin", and was being so supportive of Clark throughout his ordeal. Still, with a meaningful look, Martha spoke in a calm, but firm voice, "Just don't let it happen again!" Chloe nodded, glad that Martha was letting her and Clark off the hook so easily this time. Although she had no intention of putting her and Clark's physical relationship on hold (she still found his fat, jiggling body very HOT), she would be sure that they would have their "intimate encounters" outside the Kent home from now on! After all, that technically wouldn't break any of the Kent's rules (not under THEIR roof!) and besides, her dad's job kept him out of the house a lot anyway.

Once Chloe had left to go home, the Kent's set Clark up a makeshift bed on the barn floor, just until they could make Clark something a little more permanent the next day. Clark was wide awake for most of the night though. Although he was glad Chloe (who he was already comfortable with referring to as his "girlfriend" in his mind) was more than supportive about his transformation, he doubted the other kids at Smallville High would be so understanding! Even so, the alien eventually drifter off to sleep.

The next morning at school, the other teens at Smallville High were...
11112112111111111121221112.title: Fat Son Of Krypton!

111121121111111111212211122.content:
(Chapter author's note: this chapter will end the current story line. Also, it will feature another character gaining weight, although the focus of the gains will still be on Clark.)

Not very understanding! Thankfully, when Clark first arrived at school, most of his peers didn't recognize him. However, Clark's classmates quickly caught on, and then the harassment began. "You blew up like the Goodyear blimp!" "There goes our football season!"

Clark's attempts to explain his predicament (as he had already done for faculty) did not help . Many didn't care why Clark was fat, just that he was a target for ridicule. Although some students stopped taunting him, their pity and whispers were almost worse. One such exclamation, made under the breathe of another Senior, caught his attention. "Dang! It's like a reverse Jodi!" The mention of Jodi, a fat girl that had been Clark's former classmate, really took the Clark back.Jodi had been harassed by classmates because of her weight. The similarities to Clark's situation were not lost on him. Clark and his friends had never taken part in the taunting, and had tried to defend her. Clark wondered if he had tried hard enough to help her...

Lost in his thoughts, and without Chloe's direction (she was busy giving a taunting Senior a tongue lashing), Clark walked right into Lois, knocking her to the floor. Clark apologized and helped her up. During the weekend his parents had been away, Lois had been with some of her friends. She had not yet seen Clark's new body, and the alien knew Lois would have some insult for him. She didn't disappoint. "Wow, Clark! I heard the rumors, but...You better watch yourself LARGEville, you're can't just wander aimlessly. You're an obstacle the size of a mack..." Before Lois could finish, she stopped while looking behind Clark. There stood Chloe, glaring, and she was mad! Taking Clark's hand, Chloe spoke. "Stop making fun of my boyfriend!"

Lois's eyes went wide. She hadn't heard that Chloe was dating Clark now! She turned to Clark, "Are you two?!" "Yes." Clark replied. "But I thought you and Lana..."Chloe rolled her eyes as Clark replied. "We broke up. I think, under the circumstances, it was the best thing." Lois nodded, this was a lot to take in. First, Clark blimps out. Then Smallville High's "dream couple" breaks up, and now, her cousin was dating Clark! Lois had thought for sure that Chloe's feeling for Clark had just been infatuation. Watching Chloe now, defending her heavy boyfriend from her wrath, Lois realized that Chloe's feeling for the boy scout were much deeper. "I'm...sorry, Clark." Lois reluctantly muttered. "But you better watch yourself! If you break her heart, I'll break you!" Clark just smirked as Lois stormed off, looking embarrassed at the recent turn of events. For the rest of the year, and most of the time in the Kent home, Lois refrained from commenting on Clark's weight or appetite.

The situation with Lana was worse. Throughout Clark's first day back ,Lana had avoided Clark and Chloe.This would have bothered them,but they had enough to worry about. Lana only saw them once that day, at lunch.There, Clark wolfed down two large trays of food while casually sitting next to Chloe, who was talking and laughing with her boyfriend,unfazed by his eating habits. Lana was freaked out by this scene, and ran away before her ex could see her. It would be another week before she could work up the nerve to apologize to Clark for how she had treated him. Another month before her, Clark, and Chloe were comfortable enough with each other to be friends again. Lana's relationship with Clark would never be the same, and she still feel guilty for how she had treated him . Only after Lana formed a support group for the meteor infected did she begin to feel like a good person again, despite Clark and Chloe's protests that her reaction had been understandable, given her traumatic past.

5 years later...

Clark and Chloe's relationship continued. With Chloe, Clark found the Kryptonian stones in time to stop Zod and his lackeys from invading. They had also managed to get Lex sent to prison, and Doomsday to the Phantom Zone, after separating the beast from Davis Bloome, who got psychiatric help. Clark asked Chloe to marry him, but she told him to wait till their careers were on track. Now, she was an assistant editor at the Daily Planet, and Clark was the paper's star reporter, and Chloe had finally said "yes".

So, here Chloe was.Lois once again tried to help Chloe fit in the dress she was going to marry Clark in. But it wouldn't fit anymore, and she would need to have it adjusted! "I told you." Lois teased playfully. "Date a big guy, and before you know it, you'll pack on the pounds!" "It's not Clark's fault.." "I know!" Lois interrupted, holding up her hand. She had heard Chloe's defense of Clark."But his size has effected his appetite, that guy eats like an elephant!" Chloe shrugged, "I don't care, I love him, and I want to spend the rest of my life with him!" Lois replied, "I know that, and I'm happy for you. Clark's a great guy that makes you happy. But honestly, some of his eating habits have rubbed off on you..." Chloe nodded. Clark's increased appetite had caused him to eat large amounts of fatty foods on a daily basis. At first, Chloe had resisted any change in her own eating habits,but eventually, she found herself eating like Clark on occasion. Despite her fast metabolism and hectic schedule. Chloe had gained 10 pounds in 4 years, but next to Clark's large figure, it seemed like nothing, so Chloe hadn't worried. However, her first year as an editor had been stressful, and the workload caused her to "stress eat" large quantities of food often. The sedentary nature of the job didn't help. Clark had said nothing while Chloe had gained another 10 pounds in a year. She knew this from her bathroom scale that morning. "I know.You're not saying I shouldn't marry him?" Lois shook her head. "That's up to you. I'm only pointing out that if you stay with him, you might put on more weight." Chloe thought about this a moment. She knew Lois was right, but didn't care. "Well, that's not what I want, but Clark's worth the risk." Lois just nodded and took the dress away to be altered. She knew better than to push the issue with Chloe.Chloe just hoped that, if she did get fat, Clark would be ok with it.

A month later...

Chloe stepped on the scale. It was the day after her honeymoon, and she had been so happy,she had forgotten to watch her eating . As a consequence, she had been more gluttonous than usual,eating almost as much as Clark! Now Chloe realized she had gained another 5 pounds in the last week, more than 30 pounds heavier than when she had started dating Clark. As she stepped off the scale with a look of shock , Clark came up behind her and enveloped her in a hug, which always made her happy.Clark was now about 700 pounds, the weight he had stabilized at since becoming a sophomore in college; a result of his huge appetite, not that Chloe minded.

"Is something wrong?" Chloe sighed and pulled away from Clark. "I've gained a lot of weight since we've started dating." Clark nodded, he had noticed Chloe had put on some pounds since then. 'Does it bother her? Does she want to leave me, since my eating habits contributed to that?' Clark thought. Chloe elaborated, "I know my healing power will keep me healthy,but it bothers me. I don't want to become your fat, unattractive wife." Before Chloe could protest, Chloe added, "I know you're fat, and it looks really good on YOU. But that wasn't your fault. This is my fault." Chloe shook her potbelly to emphasize her point. "I don't want it to get out of hand." Clark had to keep himself from laughing, he couldn't believe Chloe had missed something so obvious. "Chloe, have I ever told you to control your eating habits,or go to a gym?" "No, but I thought that's because you would have felt like a hypocrite..." "No, it was because I kind of enjoyed you gaining weight.It's like you always said to me, 'It's nice to have more of you love.' I feel the same way about you! Besides, I think you potbelly is sexy!" Chloe smiled, "And you really don't mind if I get fat?!" "Let's put it this way, even if you got bigger than me, you would be my dream girl! I would like you to stay mobile though, so you can continue to enjoy life." Chloe let out a sigh of relief. "I think I can manage that. In the mean time, I have to go to work, and I hear that donut place next door calling my name!" Clark smiled, gave Chloe a kiss, and let his wife head out the door. He would meet her at work later.

When Chloe arrived at work with a dozen donuts, Lois (the Planet's newest reporter) was already there early. "Are you having a party or something?" "No, these donuts are for me. You can have one if you want though." Lois blinked in surprise. "No thanks. Um, Chloe? Do you remember that conversation we had?" "The one were you implied I was getting fat because of Clark and needed to slow down on my eating? "Yeah. Well about those donuts.." "Lois, I know you are trying to help, but Clark and I already had a talk about that." "And?" "We decided I could just get fat!" "Are you serious!?" "Yep. And you know what? I'm happier than I've been in a long time. Really takes the pressure off, you know? Anyway, I would appreciate it if you would let me worry about my weight from now on." Lois nodded and walked away in bewilderment as Chloe began munching on her first donut with a smile on her face. At this rate, Chloe knew she would at least surpass the 300 pound mark, but she didn't mind anymore. It looked like her and Clark would live happily, and fatter, ever after!
111121121111111111212211122.title: Fatter Ever After!

choices: Some very interesting and quite unexpected events happened during the dance.
Hearing how it happened, they were accepted by everyone at school. (even Chloe!)
11112112111111111122.content:
Lana looked at Clark with a new appreciation. She had realized just how difficult it was for Clark, to let her see him this way. Excusing herself she goes to the bathroom to gather her thoughts. She's possessed by a deep sadness for Clark. When he had originally asked her out, she had deeply hoped that after they had eaten together in public Clark would ask her to the school dance on Saturday night. Since she was certain that Clark wanted no one else to see him this way, that idea was now moot. Or maybe not, she then thought. With a renewed sense of confidence Lana returned to the living room. She then asked Clark, "Once you realized what the meteor rock was doing to you, where did you put that rock?" Now very uncomfortable talking to Lana about it Clark said, "It's in a box out in the barn. I think we should leave it there. Like I already told you Lex's doctor said, in probably 2 or 3 days I'll return to my normal size."

Lana then said, "Clark I just remembered something I left in the car. I'll be right back." Lana then dashed outside immediately turning towards the barn. Seconds later, Clark realized where Lana REALLY was going to and as fast as he could waddle Clark went out to stop her. When he stepped outside he felt another fattening growth spurt occur that severely tightened all of his clothes. Arriving at the open barn door, Clark heard Lana triumphantly yell out, "I've found it." Holding it up in her hand, Lana is fascinated by its sparkling in the moonlight. Clutching it with both hands next to her bust, Lana suddenly shivers. Her entire body felt like the temperature had instantly dropped below freezing. When Clark loudly tells Lana to, "please put it down before it affects you like me." She turned and saw Clark's shadow. Lana immediately realized that he had again grown bigger. It also confirmed to her what she had suspected happened to Clark when he told her about the rock in the house. Clark had been so focused on how much fatter he grew, he hadn't noticed that he was now several inches taller. At 4 feet 11 inches tall, Lana had been exactly one foot shorter than Clark. So she instinctively knew how much she tilted her head to look up at Clark. In addition to his newly enlarged stomach, Clark definitely looked a couple inches taller than when she arrived less than an hour ago.

After several seconds, unable to stand the cold Lana placed the rock back in the box. Which really pleased Clark. Descending the stairs Lana is very, very disappointed that nothing happened to her. With a very worried voice Clark asked her, "Why on Earth would you do such a dangerous action ?" Lana replied, "I had an idea, but I guess it's not going to work out." Clark was quite relieved to see that Lana was still the same petite size. He figured that the Kryptonite only affected him because he's Kryptonian. As they slowly walk back to the house Lana said, "Clark, I suddenly feel very thirsty." She then ran towards an outside standpipe, turned the water hose on and drank deeply for several minutes." Seconds after she stopped Lana became very nauseous and bloated. Her stomach was now visibly much larger than before, which understandably now worried Clark. Carefully she sat down, all the water that she had just drunk was now sloshing around inside of her. The freezing chill returns and Lana again starts shivering. That motion however causes the water to slosh even more inside of her and even worse since water expands when it freezes, so does all of Lana. In addition to seeing her waist grow over a foot larger, and along with becoming a very solid D cup, Lana's bust gained several inches. She even grows over 4 inches taller before her shivering stops.

Clark is torn up inside about what to do now. It's seeming less and less likely that the treatment Clark received will fix his problem and now Lana (who means more to him than anyone else other than the Kent's is also going to soon become a lot fatter. When she's feeling a little better all Lana has to say is, "Wow. I feel like an ice cream cone being stuffed with too much ice cream. It's wonderful." Clark is totally perplexed by her statement. Asking her, "Why did you touch that rock after I warned you how dangerous it is." She replied, "Clark, no matter how long this (pointing at his now much larger body) lasts. I didn't want you to go through this alone. [Now emboldened] How about we go to tomorrow night's dance together? You gotta admit, we'll definitely be the BIGGEST couple there?" Seconds later while they're both laughing hysterically Clark told Lana, "Sure, why not. And if the other kids aren't BIG enough to accept us the way we are, it's their loss." A little later during dinner Clark has a worried look on his face. Lana asks, "What are you thinking about?" Clark said, "I was wondering if Lex can afford to outfit both of us for the dance?" Lana blushed over a dozen shades of red.
