She plans to make a very simple dress for each of them to wear for the following school-day. When both girls handle the bill, it and THEY glow blue again and feel the tingling even stronger this time. Lana mentioned to Juliana about the stranger and she replied, "Ya, I felt a tingling last night too when he gave me his tip. Lana you don't suppose he's the one who did this to us, somehow?" Now realizing that they may have stumbled onto the answer to their recent growth, Lana worriedly said, "Gosh, if that's the case Juliana, I'm afraid that we're going to be growing again tonight."



When they both wake up the next morning, how much bigger have the 2 teens grown?


They grow larger by the same amount as they had the previous night.
121112.title: Before long, Juliana & Lana learn that they sti...

choices: Juliana
Lana
1211121.content: That night, only one of the girls had another growth surge. She grew larger by the same amount as she had the previous night. Thinking that now she wouldn't be growing anymore, the other girl feels left out. So she then wishes that she would grow twice as much bigger on the following night. She even looks FORWARD to the weight gain that'll also occur to her.
1211121.title: Neither one is becoming Goddesszilla, just yet.

choices: Lana's now MUCH bigger than Juliana would EVER wish to be in EVERY possible way.
Dr. Gold had ALSO grown, however they all DIDN'T grow bigger by the same amount.
12111212.content:
Juliana Markova was able to both sneak into her house that afternoon after school and back out early the next morning. Being so excited about the prospect of AGAIN growing several inches taller, Juliana paced back and forth all night, so she didn't sleep a wink. Around 5:30 the next morning when she decided to dress to go over to Lana's apartment, Juliana was quite annoyed to see that her new dress fit her the same as it had the previous day. Now quite disappointed about not growing ANY bigger overnight, Juliana slipped out of her house and quietly returned to the Talon. Since Lana had given her a spare key-ring to the back-door that led to her apartment, no one that morning saw the still 6' 3" Juliana with a 40 inch inseam enter the building.

Seeing Lana still sleeping above her blankets, Juliana doesn't realize yet that Lana had AGAIN grown larger overnight. Entering Lana's apartment, the first thing Juliana did was to kick off her uncomfortable shoes. It takes a couple minutes of shaking before Lana woke up and she's not one bit happy about it. Having not opened her eyes yet, Lana yelled out, "CLARK, let me sleep a little longer." Juliana very startled by Lana's statement replied, "Lana, it's me Juliana. We must have been wrong about that guy. I didn't grow any bigger last night." Still a little groggy, Lana rolls out of bed and right onto her COLD hardwood floor. THAT finally wakes her up and Lana now sees Juliana standing over her helping her to stand. Once Lana's finally standing up, the teens realize that they now seem to be about the same height! Once she's finished measuring herself, Lana's distraught to learn that in addition to now being 6' 3" tall with a 44" inseam, her bust has ballooned UP to become an impressive and very firm 44E. Lana then surprised Juliana when she burst into tears over her now even MORE enhanced figure.

Just then Lana's mobile rings. It's Clark and he wants to know if Lana will come downstairs to let him in. She asked him, "Why are you here so early?" He replied, "Yesterday after I left you and Juliana, I called Dr. Swan. Telling him what had happened to you girls he told me he would send someone right away to Smallville to check you girls out. She arrived at the farm less than an hour ago and we BOTH decided to not waste any time getting here. So Lana, how long do you think it will take for Juliana to get over here?" No time at all Clark." Lana replied. Juliana is already here and we've got a new problem to show you. She'll let you in while I get dressed."

Juliana went downstairs to let Clark in along with Dr. Beatrice Inga Gold. The good Doctor had attended college on a basketball scholarship. She was a very healthy and robust 6' 6" tall, wore 4" heels and her naturally platinum blond hair went down just past her waist. Not bothering to look outside through any of the windows, Juliana felt a little foolish when she opened the front door. Not seeing his guest she blurted out, "Are you sure this Doctor will REALLY be sympathetic to our height problem? As far as I'm concerned Clark, I wouldn't mind growing even taller than I already am." Turning her head to look at Dr. Gold, Juliana had to turn her neck to look UP over half a foot at her. Juliana then blushed from embarrassment saying, "Well Doctor, I guess you do." In good fun she replied, "You've got that right, shrimp."

Clark and the others waited outside her door for several minutes while Lana dressed. Still quite upset about her now (third !) growth surge Lana was very reluctant for Clark to see the again "newly improved" Lana Lang. So she hides in the kitchen before telling them they could enter her apartment. Once her 3 guests were standing in the living room, Clark called out, "Come on out Lana. What kind of new problem do you have? Juliana didn't grow any bigger last night." Since she was standing next to the kitchen door, Juliana quickly ducked inside. Pulling Lana into the living room she said, "I know that Clark, but Lana's grown even bigger. She's become much bustier than she was yesterday and now we're the SAME height." Even-though he was nearly 6' 2" tall, it was the first time in his life Clark was the shortest person in a room. Seeing Lana barefoot and standing as tall as him woke new feelings of compassion for Lana.

Instantly he was at Lana's side holding her. His efforts at comforting her reduced her to crying. Although she's still bare-foot, Lana looked directly into Clark's eyes. Sobbing softly she told him, "Clark, nobody will like me now. I'm a meteor freak and we both know what happens to them." Trying his best to cheer Lana up Clark then said, "Lana, with all the problems that we've been through, do you know WHY I've stayed with you all these years? It's because although you've always been shorter than me, in my heart, I've always looked up at you. Now, I actually do and I like it, A LOT." Lana then started passionately kissing Clark with a far greater intensity than she ever has in her young life. Dragging Dr. Gold with her as she leaves Juliana quickly said, "Lana ring me when you're ready to see the Doctor." Clark ended up being VERY late for school that morning and he didn't mind it one single bit.

Staying downstairs out of the way for more than a couple of hours, Juliana and Dr. Gold went back upstairs right after Clark left. She then spent well over an hour examining each girl. They told her everything that they remembered about the stranger and the tingling sensations they had felt. Juliana even took out the $5 tip that she still had, to show the Doctor. When they both touched it like they had the other $5 bill the previous day, Dr. Gold saw the blue glow surround the girls. This time the tingling was so strong they both suddenly felt very weak, she grabbed both girls before they collapsed. Beatrice doesn't notice that the blue glow also surrounds her. Beatrice DID notice the strong static shock she felt when she caught the girls, but not the tingling sensation right after that.

Theorizing that since Lana had grown again while she slept, and Juliana hadn't while she stayed awake, Dr. Gold convinced Juliana to get some sleep. Now being awake well over 30 straight hours she agreed with the Doctor. Juliana then flopped on her back on Lana's now barely long enough bed. Having set up her 2 video-recorders before Juliana went to sleep, about an hour and a half later they recorded Juliana's body start to slowly and surely grow bigger. However Lana and the Doctor didn't see it occurring, right then. Within half an hour of Juliana falling asleep, they were both out cold and sleeping on the floor on both sides of Lana's bed. While Dr. Gold was exhausted from her traveling to Smallville on such short notice, Lana's exhaustion was from her earlier activity that morning both in AND out of bed with Clark. The recorders also fully recorded Lana's and Dr. Gold's slumber. Waking up at about the same time well past sunset, they were all quite surprised to see just how BIG the girls had become.
12111212.title: Miss Lana (Long Legs) Lang

choices: To return to more or less their old sizes, someone has to make a BIG sacrifice.
Lana and Juliana learn SHARING Clark is one answer to their 'GROWING' problem.
121112122.content:
Immediately after Juliana had laid down to sleep, Dr. Gold packed up her test samples from both girls and herself (it was a comparison sample) to ship to one of Dr. Swan's labs for a thorough analysis. Lana walked with her the 2 short blocks to an overnight shipping station. Twenty minutes later, Dr. Gold and Lana were back in her apartment, laying out 2 brand new sleeping bags on her bedroom floor. When they returned to the Talon and remembering her morning surprise, Lana went through the entire building locking all the doors AND windows. On the walk back, Dr. Gold had asked Lana if she could stay a day or two at her apartment and Lana readily agreed. The reason for her quick agreement was Lana intended to pump Dr. Gold for any information she had about Clark. At this point in their lives, Lana didn't know anything about Clark's Kryptonian heritage. She thought that Dr. Gold could provide her with some information to explain Clark's unusual behaviour, or at least why he disappeared all the time. Dr. Gold had decided it would be better if she were there when Juliana woke up.

Showing up a few hours later to open the Talon, Lex wasn't alone. The coffee-house had been so busy during the previous night, Lex "borrowed" two of the female serving staff from the Castle. He wasn't about to be short handed again during Happy Hour. The place ended up being even busier that night so he wasn't. Shortly after sunset and just before leaving Smallville for the farm, Clark called Lana to find out how things were going for her. When she didn't answer he hung up without leaving a message. Clark figured Juliana and her were probably still being tested by Dr. Gold. The phone had wakened Lana, but she didn't get to it before he hung up. Now awake and feeling a little nauseous, Lana slowly crawled to her bathroom. After spending several minutes there on the floor, Lana finally drags herself up. She gasps at her again newly enlarged figure in her mirror. Looking at her bathroom door, Lana's eyes are now just about level with the top of the door frame.

Before measuring herself to see just how much bigger she has become, Lana decided to cook dinner for the 3 of them. A little over half an hour later, Dr. Gold is roused by the delicious smells of Lana's cooking. She's dismayed to discover that somehow HER body has also been affected. For although Beatrice had grown only 1 and 1/2 inches taller, her bust previously a very comfortable and easy to buy for pert 36C, has ballooned up and become a far more visible but strangely much lighter 48DD. Also her thick platinum blond hair had thickened even more as it grew to now fully cover her rear. Out of habit, Dr. Gold slipped her heels on before going into the kitchen to see Lana. Noticing that Dr. Gold and her now seemed to be nearly the same height Lana cheerily greeted her saying, "oh hi there Dr. Gold. Gee it guess it wasn't too bad this time." Beatrice asked back, "What do you mean, Lana?" Lana replied, "Well, since I now seem to be almost as tall as you, I guess I haven't grown more than 4 inches taller this time. So I suppose I can put up with my boobs being just a little larger than before. I really don't think Clark will mind it if THEY'VE grown a little bigger again. He sure enjoyed them this morning." With a very worried look on her face Dr. Gold then told Lana, "Lana, now don't get too upset about this, but somehow I've ALSO been affected. I'm an inch and a half taller, AND I'm wearing my stilettos. If you're now as tall as I am standing here, you're nearly SEVEN feet tall Lana." Lana promptly fainted.

Before going to revive Lana, Dr. Gold first checked on Juliana. It was very clear to Dr. Gold that in addition to a now larger, more rounded bust, Juliana had already grown several inches taller. Fatefully, she decided to let Juliana continue her sleeping. Taking the tape measure with her, Dr. Gold returned to the kitchen to wake up Lana. It took her several tries with smelling salts before Lana stayed awake. Each time she was half-awake, Lana started saying seven feet and would again faint away. Once they had finished cooking dinner, Dr. Gold and Lana went to measure her in her living room. It seems that Dr. Gold was wrong about Lana. She wasn't almost 7 feet tall, along with her bust Lana's inseam had grown 11 inches this time. She was now 7' 2'' tall and sporting a surprisingly firm AND bouncy 53F bust. Also her weight had now more than doubled over the past few days. Just before closing, Lex went upstairs knocking on her apartment door. Just like the previous night he was checking to see if she needed anything before he left. Again keeping her door closed, Lana thanked him for his concern about her and said nothing else.

The next morning, Lana and Dr. Gold were very relieved to discover that neither of them grew larger that night. Clark stopped by on his way to school that morning to pick up Lana's homework. Still uncertain over whether or not she wanted Clark to see the improved and now very much LARGER Lana she gave her homework assignments to Dr. Gold. Dr. Gold met Clark at the back-door, giving him Lana's school-work to turn in and the key-ring from Juliana's purse. Dr. Gold told Clark to come back after school when the Talon was busy. She knew by then some of the results would be available. Whether or not Lana had decided to let Clark see her new size by then, Dr. Gold knew that it would be much better for Lana's sake if Lana went through this with Clark at her side.

Returning around 6:30, Clark decided to get something for himself and Lana before going upstairs to see her. Sitting by the locked side door that went upstairs to Lana's apartment and a couple of offices, Clark saw Lex exit it in a foul mood. It turns out his idea had turned out to be a little bit TOO successful. With Lana now out "sick" for 3 days the place was rapidly running low on many things. Lex had just spent most of the past hour trying to resupply the place and he wasn't at all happy with some of the over-seas freight charges he was paying for over-night delivery. Since he intended to go back upstairs in a few minutes, Lex didn't lock the door. Scowling as he headed for the register, Lex didn't even notice Clark sitting at the table closest to the door. A couple of minutes later the stranger who had started Lana's and the other's growth sat down next to Clark saying, " Say aren't you that boy I saw here a few days ago with that sort-of short but pretty hostess at the register." Startled by the question, Clark turned his head to see who was talking to him. It took him a few seconds before he recognized the very tall, sandy haired stranger. He then asked, "Say, do you happen to know if either of those two girls are working here today?" Wondering why this guy is suddenly interested in Lana and Juliana, Clark warily replied, "I don't think so. I haven't seen either of them in school the past couple of days. I think they might have come down with something."

Now not wanting to go upstairs while that fellow's sitting next to him Clark orders himself 2 more of Lana's special coffees. Realizing by his body language, Clark is unsettled by his presence the stranger moves to a nearby table that just became free. Over 10 minutes later, just as Clark has finished slowly sipping his first drink, the building shakes like a small earthquake is happening. Unseen by Lex, Clark dashes off upstairs to check on Lana. Out of curiosity more than anything else the stranger follows him. Arriving at Lana's apartment, Clark opens the door before realizing that it WAS locked. The lock is now ruined and Lana screamed when she saw Clark standing there just inside the door-way. She happened to be on her knees behind a table looking at her open bedroom door. Since all of her growth has been in her legs, Clark doesn't yet realize that Lana's now a foot taller than him. Taking a few steps further inside and seeing her living room now a big mess Clark asked Lana, "What's happened here? Who caused this? Where is Dr. Gold?" Shakily pointing at her bedroom door Lana replied," There she is with Juliana. Clark, Juliana's has become a giantess." Breaking down into tears again, Lana pleaded with Clark, "You'll still like me no matter how big I end up growing now, won't you Clark?"

Before he can answer her, Lana saw the stranger standing a few steps behind Clark. The stranger was muttering to himself, "Oh, oh. This hasn't turned out like it's supposed to. He's not going to be at all happy with me, over this." So now pointing at the stranger and at the top of her now exquisite and extremely enhanced chest Lana screamed, "GRAB HIM CLARK! HE'S THE ONE WHO CAUSED ALL OF THIS." By the time Clark has turned around the stranger had already grabbed the door and slammed it shut. Since the door's lock was now totally useless it swung back open. Clark was mystified at the empty space he's now looking at. [The stranger had again disappeared exactly the same way as the first night Lana saw him.] The hallway in both directions was also empty. Walking back inside Lana's apartment, Clark still doesn't see Lana's new longer legs. He was now totally focused looking at the now well OVER 9 foot tall Juliana. Her head and right shoulder were now through Lana's bedroom ceiling. It had happened when she stood up after waking a few minutes earlier. Trying to free herself from the ceiling had caused the small earth-quake Clark and everyone else had felt downstairs. Fortunately for Juliana, at least for now, her head poking part-way through the roof couldn't be seen from the street.
121112122.title: Jumping Jehosaphat, Junior Juliana's Jumbo-fied !!

choices: Going up, Lana starts seeing things from a new perspective.
Lana painfully learns way too late. BIGGER IS NOT NECESSARILY BETTER !
12112.content:
The reason Lana had lucked out with having her physical education class being canceled that day was that the Smallville High Junior Varsity Basketball team had had its game hastily rescheduled when their opponents Gymnasium became unavailable due to weather damage. It was one of the places the Autumn Tournament was being held this year. So all P. E. classes after lunch had been canceled for Thursday and Friday - the school needed the extra time to set up the gym for the afternoon games to be played on both days.

So for now, Lana had been reprieved on explaining why she was wearing her 'high heels' to the locker-room. She knew as soon as she removed her dress that every girl there would see the truth that she was afraid to admit to right now. Believing her sudden growth was a one-time occurrence, Lana thought that she now had until Monday to come up with an explanation for growing 3 1/2 inches taller overnight.

With all but 1/2 inch of her growth occurring in her legs, Lana's work went by quicker than usual, and by the time 5:30 rolled around she wasn't quite feeling as tired as she normally would. Taking her break a couple minutes before 5:30, Lana grabbed a table in a secluded corner and waited anxiously for Clark arrive. Hopefully, this time, he would not let her down.

She was pleasantly surprised to see Clark enter the Talon precisely on time (for once). With his track record of not showing up due to some last minute 'emergency', Lana had been debating with herself over how long she would wait for him to show.

When she stood up to call him over to her table, he seemed to notice her increased height. She recalled that she had been a seated position when they had encountered one another at lunch time, and she wondered if would mention her growth spurt...

Clark walked over to Lana's table briskly, with a warm smile on his lips. "Hey Lana," Clark greeted. "I can help you with that washing if you like?"

Surprised and suddenly speechless over Clark's offer, Lana was puzzled until she remembered her explanation about why she was wearing that dress to school. Lana hadn't changed her clothes after walking over to the Talon (in record time) that afternoon.

"Well...thanks," Lana said quietly, with a half smile. "But erm...I can handle it."

With her back to the door, Lana did not see the mysterious stranger from yesterday enter the Talon, and sit near enough to hear her conversation with Clark...

After a few minutes of small talk, Lana got up, went over to the counter, and prepared 2 coffees with pasties for them to snack on.

Watching her walk over to the counter, Clark appreciated how much more inviting Lana's rear swayed than it has in the past. He starts daydreaming about Lana being as tall and big as him. {During the past year or so, Clark had seriously started worrying that Lana was getting more skittish around him because he had grown so much taller than her.}

By the time Lana returned with their snacks Clark had a very contented look on his face.

Asking him what he was thinking about, taking her right hand in his left in a low voice (forcing her to lean towards him to hear) Clark tells Lana just how much he likes seeing her in that dress.

Lana is so touched by his sentiment, she blushes 7 different shades of red.

Now whispering, Clark continues saying, "Lana, wouldn't it be wonderful if you would you grow as much as me one day."

Now totally overcome by her emotions, Lana does not correctly hear Clark's wish. So without contemplating any possible consequences to herself, Lana immediately says, "Yes, Clark I truly wish we could really grow together one day."

She then lovingly kisses him on the lips. Seconds later, Lana hears a huskily deep and sexy feminine voice {that she suddenly wishes was hers} in her head say, "GRANTED". At first surprised and then perplexed by the voice, within a minute Lana has shrugged it off.

For the rest of Lana's break they eat their snacks in silence. They're both afraid to say anything because it might destroy this wonderful mood they're sharing.

---

The mysterious stranger fully intends to immediately fulfill Lana's wish when she resumes working. Unfortunately, due to the unexpected basketball game being held at the High School the Talon had been pretty packed all afternoon. So Lana spent over an hour restocking and checking inventory in the storeroom. Before she started serving again at the front counter the stranger was forced to leave. The stranger could not stay indefinitely at any one place.

---

Lana finishes work, closes up and then goes upstairs to her bedroom for some well deserved sleep. Waking up the next morning, Lana spends twice as longer showering as she normally would because she's so relaxed. Daydreaming about what had happened the previous afternoon with Clark, Lana doesn't even remember that she's now 3 1/2 inches taller until she dresses for school.

Since all of her regular school dresses have become to short to wear, Lana again puts on one of her party dresses and walks to school. Everybody assumes she still hasn't been able to do her washing. Anyone who was at the Talon yesterday saw just how busy it was. None the less, she was still concerned over how she was going to explain things when she can't hide her new improved legs on Monday.

Lana got through the school day without any problems. Not too surprisingly to her, Lana does not see Clark at all that day. After school during her walk to the Talon, [which each time was getting faster] Lana thinks that maybe Clark was embarrassed about what he had told her the previous afternoon. Even-though they were now both Seniors, Lana thought there were times when Clark was still shy around her. Which had contributed to her confusion about their relationship and if there should be one.
12112.title: The Wish

choices: All it takes is one explosion of growth for Lana to see things anew.
Daily, Lana inch(es) closer to the goal she doesn't know she had.
121121.content:
Due to now having only 2 choices rather than 3, this chapter is the set-up for those 2 other choices.

Sometime between Friday afternoon and the Talon closing on Sunday the stranger is able to "grant" Lana's wish, which she hadn't realized she was making. Is she the only one who can see the mysterious stranger inside the Talon?

It might be more fun if while working at the Talon someone comes in and suspects that there is something going on with Lana. After all, why should she continue wearing those long dresses with heels everyday at work.
121121.title: Choices

choices: Lana starts work, but soon enough, she is feeling hungry again...
Lana is overcome with hunger on the walk to the Talon...
Lana encounters someone on the way to the Talon...
1213.content:
The next morning, Lana's noisy alarm went off. She gave a groan and slammed her hand down on top of the wretched source of the noise, then plunged her head back into her pillow, determined to get an extra half hour in bed. As she turned over and prepared to resume her sleep, she was disturbed by a loud rumbling from beneath the sheets. Though a little startled at first, it didn't take long for Lana to realise that the noise had come from inside her. It was the noise of her stomach rumbling.

Lana couldn't really recall ever feeling hungry at this hour before - she wasn't a breakfast person, and was usually in such a rush to leave the house and open up the Talon that she had to wait until around 11am before she even had so much as a snack. She decided to ignore the noises of her stomach and return to sleep, but her tummy didn't want to stay quiet...

For the next ten minutes, Lana tossed and turned in bed as her stomach rumbled and gargled in protest. With each passing moment, Lana could feel herself growing more and more hungry. Ten minutes on, she had been unable to get back to sleep, and was completely ravenous.

"Urghh..." Lana groaned, her stomach aching slightly as she finally decided to sit up. "I'm getting up."

Lana swung her legs over the side of the bed and rubbed her eyes tiredly before standing up, stretching and letting out a yawn. She decided to get herself ready before she grabbed something to eat, so quickly changed into some tight fitting jeans and a sweater that clung to her upper body. She tied her hair back, grabbed her shoes, and hurried to the kitchen. Her stomach continued to growl, and the hunger she was feeling was actually beginning to grow quite painful.

Lana rubbed her stomach absent mindedly as she moved into the kitchen. She began searching through the cupboards. Unfortunately, the cupboards were pretty bare. Lana soon realised she had failed to get any food in this week, leaving her with little more than bread, milk and a half empty box of cereal.

"I guess this'll have to do," Lana said to herself, grabbing the cereal, the milk and a bowl.

She made herself a bowl, and immediately dug in. She was still confused about why exactly she was feeling this hungry, but as she began to eat, she forgot all about that. Some of the hunger pains in her stomach were beginning to ease as she continued to stuff spoonful after spoonful of cereal into her mouth. Soon enough, Lana had finished the bowl, but she knew that she wasn't full. She poured herself another, larger bowl, filled it with milk, and dug in.

With each mouthful, Lana began to feel the emptiness in her stomach fade away, and after finishing her second bowl, the feeling of hunger seemed to have gone away completely. She patted her stomach in satisfaction, checked the clock - for once, it seemed she was going to be out of the house in plenty of time.

Lana placed the empty bowl in the sink, grabbed her bag, and left the house, heading to the Talon to begin her day's work.
1213.title: Hunger

choices: Chloe
Clark
12133.content:
Lana had always enjoyed the walk to work, but lately, she had been in such a rush to get there on time that she hadn't had the time to appreciate it. With plenty of time to spare this morning, she decided to take her time and enjoy the walk.

As she headed down the street, she spotted a familiar face...
12133.title: Familiar face

choices: Lana decides to sample the food herself...
The free samples become hugely popular...
Lana recieves a phone call from the company...
122.content:
As Lana watched Clark leave, she saw someone else enter. A tall man, dressed in the familiar garb of a delivery man, had entered the Talon, and was wheeling a cart over to Lana's desk. Lana watched him approach in confusion; this wasn't her usual delivery guy, nor was she expecting anything today.

"Mornin miss," the delivery man said, parking the cart and drawing a piece of paper from his pocket. "I've got a delivery for a Lana Lang."

"That's me," Lana said. "But delivery isn't until Tuesday..."

"They're free samples," the delivery guy replied, patting the top of the cart. "Some new food company in Metropolis is handing them out...trying to drum up some business, I guess."

"Any idea what's in there?" Lana asked, peering over the counter at the cart.

The delivery guy shrugged and lifted the lid, revealing a whole pack of cakes, muffins, pastries and various other items. Lana was surprised at this company's generosity.

"You want 'em?" The delivery guy asked, closing the lid.

"Sure, I'll take them," Lana said.

"Just sign here," the delivery guy said, passing a clip board to Lana over the counter.

Lana didn't bother reading the small-print; it was never important anyway. She quickly signed her name and passed the man back his clipboard.

"Right, it's all yours!" The delivery guy smiled, then turned and walked out.

Lana walked around the other side of the counter, grabbed the cart, and wheeled it around the back of the store. She lifted the lid and had another look inside; there was a ton of stuff inside! Much more than she had originally thought. Whatever company it was that had decided to give her these samples were certainly being generous. She grabbed a few of the items and placed them on the counter, then made up a sign which read 'FREE! PLEASE TAKE ONE!' It was the least she could do considering how much stuff they had sent her.

She looked at the items in the cart - nothing in there seemed particularly healthy, but they all fit in well with the Talon's coffee shop theme.
122.title: The delivery

choices: Lana chooses a chocolate brownie... (Weight Gain)
Lana chooses a blueberry muffin... (Blueberry expansion)
Lana chooses a doughnut... (Butt expansion)
1221.content:
As she looked through the items, Lana began to feel hungry, and she realised she hadn't eaten anything all day. The Talon had quietened down in the last few moments, and it didn't look like there were any other customers to be served, so Lana decided to grab something to eat. While she liked to eat healthily and keep her slim, toned figure, she was feeling awfully tempted by the treats in the cart...

She took one last look at the front desk, checking there were no customers waiting, and then she went to pick something out of the cart...
1221.title: Snacktime

choices: Lana's soon out of brownies and feeling hungry.
A week later, Chloe is chubby bordering on fat. Lana's downright obese.
12211.content:
The brownie melted on her tastebuds, Lana's dark eyes widening at the assault on her tongue. It was incredible!

But just that single brownie wouldn't be enough for her. Again, checking around, she saw that there were no customers.

This time she took four brownies...

///

A customer did finally arrive, and one Lana was familiar with, though she was a bit too focused on eating yet another brownie to take in her friend.

"Um...Lana...hello, anybody home?"

Blinking a bit, Lana looked at Chloe then and smiled.

"Yeah...sorry about that. What can I get you?"

"I'll try some of those brownies you've obviously been snacking on, if there are any left by now."

Lana blushed but nodded, placing one in front of Chloe.

After paying, Chloe moved to a table nearby and looked again at Lana.

Brownie crumbs were set in a ring around her lips and was it her imagination or did Lana now have a pudgy pot belly in place of her normally trim stomach?

Soon enough though, she decided to ignore Lana and focus instead on her treat.

Two minutes later, Chloe all but ran up to the counter, a twenty in her hand.

"Give me more of those brownies!"
12211.title: Lana chooses a chocolate brownie... (Weight Gain)

122111.content:
It didn't take long for the brownies to sell out. People were buying them in bulk, devouring two or three at a time and still wanting more. The free samples Lana had laid out were long gone, and she was running low on the stock that the food company had gifted her. Lana had eaten quite a few herself, ditching her usually well regimented diet as soon as the delicious chocolate goodies touched her lips; she wasn't proud of herself, but she had somehow managed to eat over a dozen of the delicious brownies.

"Hey, got anymore of those brownies?"

"I'll take another muffin!"

"Hey, where are those brownies you were selling earlier?"

Lana was struggling to keep the customers at bay, and they seemed to be multiplying by the minute. "I'm sorry!" She called out over the crowd forming around her. "We're all out!"

There were annoyed groans and sad sighs from the customers, who began to filter out of the door, rubbing their stomachs hungrily as they headed back onto the streets. Lana didn't care though, she had sold enough products today to keep the store going for the next month at least! Business had never been so good. She looked over the room and saw that the few customers that remained were slumped in their chairs, looking strangely tired. One of them was Chloe, who was practically sprawled out on one of the comfy leather chairs on the far side of the room.

Lana wasn't surprised to see Chloe looking less than energetic. She had packed away much more food than usual this afternoon, consuming more of those sought after brownies than the average customer. Lana had eaten just as many, of course, but she hadn't had the luxury of slouching in a comfy chair. The beautiful brunette glanced down at her stomach, only to find it's flat, toned shape had been replaced with a slight bulge. She wasn't shocked, given the fact she had stuffed so many chocolate treats down her throat, but it was a strange sight.

Leaving the counter for a moment, Lana crossed the room and sat in the chair opposite Chloe. "How you doin?" She asked.

Chloe gave a groan and rubbed her stomach. "I think I might have overdone it," she moaned.

Lana noticed that Chloe's stomach had expanded into a large ball, giving her the look of a woman in the early stages of pregnancy. "Yeah...those brownies really went down a storm."

"I don't suppose...you have any left?" Chloe asked, blushing.

"You can't still be hungry?" Lana laughed.

"Strangely...yes," Chloe patted her bloated belly.

Lana was about to speak, when a loud rumbling from her own stomach cut her short. Suddenly, she was hungry. Her stomach rumbled and rumbled, even as she tried to ignore it's cries. How could she still be hungry after all she had eaten? Perhaps the brownies weren't all that filling? But as her stomach continued to growl angrily, she knew she needed to eat something...

123.content:
As the day went on, Lana started to feel bad about turning down Clark's offer. He had, at least, made an effort to patch things up with her after their recent relationship difficulties, perhaps she had been too hasty in turning down his offer. For the rest of the day, Clark was once again on her mind...

When her shift was over, Lana gathered up her things and began to head home. After several hours of careful consideration, she had finally decided to call Clark and ask if his earlier offer was open. As she walked down the street, she flipped open her phone and dialled his number.

When Clark answered the phone, he sounded surprised. "Lana?"

"Hey Clark," Lana said. "I was thinking about your offer earlier, and I'm sorry I turned you down. Listen, I've had time to think about it and...are you still free tonight?"

"Uh...yeah, sure!" Clark exclaimed excitedly. "Do you want to go to that new diner that's opened up in town?"

"Sure," Lana said. "I'll see you around seven?"

"It's a date," Clark said.

---

Later that evening, after she had gone home, showered and made herself up, Lana headed back into town and arrived at the new diner. She looked around, but couldn't see Clark anywhere, but, then again, she was half an hour early.

"Can I help you, Miss?"

Lana turned to see a blonde, smiling, waitress. She decided it would be best to grab a table now, before it got too crowded.

"Could I get a table for two please?" Lana asked.

"Sure," the waitress replied cheerfully, leading Lana over to a small, two person table. "Would you like to see the menu?"

"Oh, I'll wait for my friend to arrive first," Lana said.

The waitress nodded and hurried away, and Lana stared at the door, waiting for Clark's arrival. As she waited, Lana began to grow more nervous...did her hair look okay? Was Clark going to propose they get back together? Was this really the right place to meet? These questions occupied her thoughts for the next half hour, while she continued to stare at the door. Each time it swung open, she expected to see Clark walk in, but each time, she was left disappointed. It had now reached seven o'clock, and there was no sign of Clark. Lana checked her phone - no messages.

She sighed and lent back in her chair; perhaps, as usual, Clark wasn't going to show...

"Would you like to see the menu now Miss?"

Lana looked up to see the waitress smiling down at her again. "Sure, why not?"

The waitress pulled out a menu from her clipboard and handed it to Lana, then walked off. Lana had a quick flick through. Nothing on the menu seemed to be especially healthy - mammoth burger and fries, pizza and fries, souther fried chicken and fries...

"Is there anything that doesn't come with fries?" Lana muttered to herself. None the less, she had to admit that the accompanying pictures on the menu made the food look appetising.

She put the menu aside and glanced at her watch again, it was now five minutes past seven...

Lana continued to wait, but the minutes went by, and there was still no sign of Clark. Time dragged on, and soon enough, it had reached half seven. Lana was feeling more than a little annoyed - Clark had let her down once again, and it had been him that first extended the invitation for tonight! She resigned herself to the fact he wasn't coming, and pulled open the menu...

After Lana had waited a ridiculously long time for Clark to arrive, she began to gather her things together to go home. However, before she could leave, Clark came rushing in the door...exactly one hour late!

"Where have you been!" Lana asked Clark. "We were supposed to meet over an hour ago and I was about to leave! " Glancing down at Clark backpack, she added, and what are you doing with your schoolbag with you on a Saturday?" Clark glanced at Lana nervously. The truth was that he had been finishing up his homework earlier that day when he had been notified by Chloe about a local meteor freak on the loose, which had taken Clark several hours to find and apprehend. Clark had been so preoccupied with that task, he had not noticed he still had his backpack with him. Of course, he could not tell Lana all of that! "Sorry, I was just studying, and I lost track of time!" Clark lied. "I won't let , happen again! Anyway, I see you have been looking at the menu for this place, is there anything you want?"

Lana sighed in exasperation, but decided to let Clark's lack of "time management skills" go this time. "Actually yes, Waiting here so long has made me really hungry. Could you get me the pizza and fries, please?!" Lana figured she could afford to indulge herself just this once. "Sure!" Clark replied a little too enthusiastically. "I'll get the same thing."

Several minutes after they ordered, Clark and Lana's food arrived. Lana was surprised to find out that the portions at this restaurant where huge! Even Clark said he wasn't sure he would be able to finish his plate...and sure enough Clark finished eating after only half of his plate was gone! Lana, on the other hand, had grown very hungry while waiting for Clark, and the food smelled amazing! Therefore, to both Clark and Lana's surprise, the dark haired teenage girl managed to finish her entire plate of pizza and fries, and now felt completely stuffed! Hoping Clark wouldn't notice, Lana began to discretely rub her swollen tummy while Clark and herself talked about the status of their "friendship"! However, while she was trying to explain to Clark that she wasn't sure they should become a couple again just yet, she thought she caught Clark smiling while staring at her rubbing her bare stomach over the lip of the booth a few times...but she thought she must just have been imagining things.

After Clark had expressed his reluctant agreement wish Lana's decision and paying their bill, he began to get up from the table...when his backpack, which had been begun to come unzipped after it had been bumped during Clark's fight with the meteor freak, suddenly fell open, sending all of its contents spilling on to the floor. As Clark began to pick up his belongings from the floor, Lana noticed something unusual. Along with his books and notebooks from school, Clark had also been keeping a magazine in his schoolbag which. When Clark saw her looking at it, Clark quickly put it back in his bag and took of with a rushed goodbye, almost as if he had not wanted Lana to see it! Lana wondered at Clark's behavior, which had been even stranger that normal and at what little she had been able to make out from the magazines cover: a portrait of a very fat woman and, in slightly smaller letters than the magazines title, which had been obstructed from her view, the letters "BBW"!

LATER THAT NIGHT...
Although Lana had tried to tell herself that, since Clark and her were not currently together, he could read whatever he wanted, and that the contents of the mysterious magazine where none of her business, Lana's curiosity got the better of her, and she opened up her Internet browser and typed in the letters "BBW". Instantly, thousands of search results popped onto the screen. After looking at a few of the suggested sites for about half an hour, Lana began to understand that, in some circles, fat women were actually considered attractive and were called "Big, Beautiful Women" or BBW. Therefore, Lana thought to herself, Clark's magazine must have been a BBW admirer's magazine, and Clark must be attracted to fat girls! That would explain why Clark would have been staring at her stuffed belly earlier today...

"But that doesn't make sense!" Lana thought. " I'm pretty skinny, and Clark has liked me for years..." Oh. Lana nearly gasped as she remembered that, during grade school and for a short time in Middle School, she had been rather fat herself. She had lost the weight later, of course, but she distinctly remembered that Clark had liked her even then. In fact, Lana thought to herself, he had actually seemed to pay even more attention to her then, even though other boys wouldn't give her the time of day during that period of her life. Since she had not liked Clark then, she had not really thought about why that was, but now it was all starting to make sense. Clark had first become attracted to her when she was fat, and from the look he had on his face when he had been staring at her bloated belly, he secretly wanted her to get fat again!

"Is that why Clark has been acting so strangely around me? Is that why relationships between him and me always seem to get awkward and fall apart?!"

...After much deliberation, Lana decided that....

12333.content:
So that night, Lana went to bed with a new resolve to try patching things up with Clark. She figures that by eating larger portions at EVERY meal she should gain a couple of pounds every week. That way after 3 months of effort she should be at least 20 pounds heavier. Thinking to herself that that should be enough weight gain for Clark to respond positively to the NEW Lana. If Clark DOES show more interest in her, Lana will know for sure that Clark prefers that his girl-friend be a Big, Beautiful woman. Which will be alright with her. On the other hand, if Clark's interest in her doesn't substantially increase, Lana has decided that she'll break up with Clark for good. After all, she muses, Clearly Lex is also interested in me. She then figures having a wealthy husband can't be as bad as people say.

So the next morning when she makes breakfast, Lana start her new 'weight gaining' diet. First off, she fries 3 eggs rather than her normal two, has 3 slices of toast instead of her usual one and pours herself an extra, large glass of fresh juice which she almost never has in the morning. Lunch and dinner are similarly larger that day and every day after-wards. Oddly, Lana doesn't run into Clark at all for the next couple of weeks. It starts seeming to her, that he's deliberately trying to avoid her. Which doesn't sit well with her. It had been so many years since Lana had lost weight and became thin she has forgotten her old eating habits. It had taken her nearly a year and a half to fully slim down and THAT was with a doctor's continuing oversight. Her Aunt Nell remembered how roly, poly she and Lana's mother had been when THEY had started High School. She hadn't wanted Lana to suffer through the same taunting by the other students THEY had both suffered through at Smallville High. Late in tenth grade for Nell, they had finally worked up the courage to lose a lot of weight together. By the time Nell started eleventh grade they were now slim enough that all the terrible things being said about them, not always behind their backs, stopped for good.

So after a few days of total release from her long repressing diet, Lana starts to really gain weight. She pack on the pounds a lot quicker than she anticipated and soon Lana realizes that she had neglected to consider one extremely important factor. With her gaining as much weight as she intends to her ENTIRE wardrobe WILL become unwearable, necessitating her replacing everything that she owns in her closet and dresser. She had also forgotten about how hyper-active she was when she was heavier. There was something about her normally large appetite that made her act like a whirling dervish. When Lana had been the heaviest girl in her grade she had also been the strongest, but absolutely NO one had noticed THAT at the time. So in addition to growing fatter, Lana was quickly developing some serious muscle throughout her slowly enlarging frame. Curiously, even though it wouldn't normally be expected now that she was past her eighteenth birthday, Lana's body began growing taller and her bust also became more prominent.

When she had decided to gain weight, Lana deliberately didn't weigh herself. She wanted to wait until after the eight weeks were up. She didn't want to get disappointed with herself, if she wasn't gaining weight as fast as she wanted. Good or bad, she wanted to be surprised by the final result. Which came a lot quicker than she had considered possible. Having not seen Clark for two weeks, Lana decided to start hunting for him. After all, she was ballooning up fast and Lana was now breathless at finding out what Clark's reaction would be when he sees her larger body for the first time. When Lana FINALLY did run into Clark sixteen days after starting her diet, in addition to already gaining 3 dress sizes, and although she didn't know it, Lana has already gained 15 pounds! The look on Clark's face was utterly priceless. She could clearly see that he was VERY, definitely interested in her new, much enhanced figure. Which then showed on her face when she blushed at his ( quite risque for Clark) comments about her new shape.

What Lana obviously couldn't know about and neither did Clark was the REASON for his interest in Big, Beautiful women. It was actually an essential part of his Kryptonian heritage. Around 50,000 Kryptonian years ago, Clark's home planet had gone through some quite severe climatological changes. It had the effect of changing the evolution of the normal development for adolescent Kryptonian girls as they matured fully into grown women. Forage had become quite sparse, so all Kryptonian girls who survived during that time acquired an ability similar to Earth camels. However, in their case instead of evolving the capacity to store a lot of water in their bodies, all of them acquired the ability to store an unusually large amount of fatty tissue in their bodies as they entered puberty. So Clark just can't help himself from admiring very heavy-set girls, like Lana had been when she was younger. He realized that culturally it's not normal on Earth to desire a large woman as a possible girl-friend/wife so he just chalks it up to being another one of those differences from Earthlings that he needs to keep hidden. So as he grew older, Clark was relieved to learn that SOME Earth-men actually DO prefer large, busty women rather than the sizes 0 to 4 usually seen as fashion models.

Now that she knows that Clark definitely desires her growing larger, Lana does so with a vengeance. By the following Monday, Lana gains another 10 pounds and then another week later, Lana has Clark totally eating out of her hand, except for one increasingly important request of hers. The most surprising thing happening to Lana is her rapid muscle development. It seems to her that she's gaining just as much muscle as fat. Which after thinking about it she decides can't be all that bad. After all, as long as Clark is showing so much more interest in her, she really isn't all that concerned with what anyone else says about her now rapidly enlarging body. One month after she started her quest to claim Clark for herself, it's become clear to everyone in Smallville that even-though she has already gained nearly 40 pounds, Lana will soon be a very large and hefty Amazon. Other totally unexpected changes start occurring to Lana.

Her metabolism has kicked into turbo-charged growth causing her to be even more active than when she was a fat kid. If Clark hadn't had super-speed on his side, he would've been unable to KEEP UP with Lana's movement! One side-effect that she utterly adores is Lana now only needs about 5 hours of sleep a night. Which only serves to provide her with more time to eat and grow bigger for Clark. After 40 days and 70 pounds heavier than when she started, Lana starts growing concerned about Clark's ultimate intentions about her. Clark does everything she asks him except having sex. Every single time she brings up the issue, he starts putting food (that suddenly and mysteriously appears in his hands) in her mouth. Admittedly she doesn't mind that ONE SINGLE bit, but she wonders WHY he STILL hasn't asked her to have sex with him. By now, Lana's really, really ready for it and she's growing increasingly frustrated that she's still a virgin! Two more weeks later and another 55 pounds heavier Lana's situation hasn't changed.

Note: This story is set during the third season of the show.

Chloe sat inhaling the steam from her chicken soup. The cafeteria only served it once a month and she was going to savor it. She saw Pete and Clark walk over with trays of cheeseburger and chips.

“You know,” Pete said. “Some people tend to stay home when they’re sick. Like, away from school.”

“I’m not sick, I just like chicken soup.” She pointed at her soup. “Delicious and nutritious.” Then at his tray. “Greasy and calorific.”

“So, if cheeseburger and chips are so bad for you, why do they serve them every day and they only serve soup once a month?” He pointed out.

“Because the Principal is in league with the alien invaders. They plan to eat you all, but they can only digest the fat from a human.”

“Ah, so that’s why you diet.” Clark joked. “You want to betray the Human race.”

“I don’t diet. I just have a hyperactive metabolism. I don’t want to look like a brain dead cheerleader, you know.” Chloe continued in her thoughts. ‘Besides, I’d rather have womanly curves, damn it.’

“Ha! Yeah, sure. So why, when you aren’t eating chicken soup, do you always have a sandwich? Why don’t you eat a cheeseburger?” Pete asked.

“I’ll eat what I like, thank you very much.” Chloe said. ‘But I really hadn’t thought about it. Do I really eat that little? Could I be sabotaging myself?’

“A likely story. You just want to stay thin for your evil alien overlords.” Pete joked. “Admit it.”

“I’ll tell you what,” Said Chloe. “I’ll take up eating burgers and things, for one month. I’ll even document it for the Torch. If I gain more than five pounds, the last article will have a headline an inch high, saying 'PETE ROSS IS ALWAYS RIGHT!' It will be in block capitals.”

Pete blinked. “Really?”

Chloe nodded. “But if I have to eat your grease-fest, you’re gonna eat what I would eat. Sandwiches and soup for lunch, fruit and cereal for breakfast, everything. And you document it for the Torch too. I know it’s a daily newsletter but all I ask is a paragraph or so. Then, if you lose so much as five pounds, I get to write ‘CHLOE SULLIVAN IS ALWAYS RIGHT!’ in block capitals.”

Pete mused on it. Clark struggled to hide a smirk at this ridiculous bet. “Fine. I can do it, if you can.”

13112211111.title: Chloe grows, and Lana (and Pete!?) scheme

131122111112.content:
The weekend that all four teens had been looking forward to (for different reasons) finally arrived. After meeting at the parking lot of Smallville high after school Friday, the four of them drove to Jakelburk, where the amusement park was located. What Pete had neglected to take into account was that the amusement park was almost 8 hours away! There was not way they could even get back to Smallvile before morning, much less ride on rides at the amusement park. After explaining the situation to their parents, it had been decided that the four of them were mature enough to stay at a hotel for a couple nights...as long as the guys and girls stayed in separate rooms.of course. It turned out though, that the only two rooms left in the hotel were a room with two single beds that had just had a mice problem(which had been taken care of), and room with a double bed. Left with little choice, they checked out the rooms.

"I'm sorry, but I can't go in the room with the singles, I'm allergic to mice!", Pete said. Clark nodded, he had known this about Pete for years. However, he definitely did not know what would happen next. "Oh, um...so am I." Lana said quietly. She wasn't really allergic to mice, but none of the other three knew that, and it would give her and Pete a chance to hammer out some of the details of their plan before morning. "Is that the real reason you're lying?" The annoying voice in Lana's head returned. She tried to make it shut up. The other three in the group stared at Lana. "Houston, we have a problem!" Chloe exclaimed. Clark thought for a moment, then said, "Let's be reasonable about this, shall we? This is the only hotel in town, and we can't drive back now. How about Chloe and I stay in the room with two beds, and Pete and Lana stay in the room with one? Our parents won't have to know anything, Besides, I'm sure there will be a coach in the room with the double for Pete or Lana to sleep on."

As it turned out, there was no coach in Pete and Lana's room, which was several rooms away from Clark and Chloe. "At least they won't be able to hear us talk about the plan." Lana thought. " or get some alone time with Pete..."the voice insisted. Before Lana could tell it to shut up again, Pete, who was now (awkwardly) lying next to Lana on the bed said, "Wow.Weird coincidence that you and I have the same allergy, right? Are you sure you don't want me to sleep on the floor?" "No, we can be grown up about this, right? Besides this room has a hard floor. And there's one more thing...I lied about the mouse allergy, I just wanted to be able to talk to you about our plan again before tomorrow."

At the mention of the plan, Pete's body stiffened. "Look, Lana, about the plan...I'm sorry but I can't go through with it. I know we have been planning on breaking up Clark and Chloe for weeks, but...Clark and Chloe are my friends, and now I can see that they make each other really happy, I don't want to mess with that. Besides, I've finally started to get over Chloe anyway. I'll understand if your mad, but I just can't go thought with this."

For some reason, however, Lana wasn't that upset, and she just shrugged and said, "You know what? I actually know what you mean. They do look happy together, and I think I'm finally starting to get over Clark." Only after she had spoken these words, Lana realized they were all true. And the reason for that revelation, the last bit anyway, was lying in bed right next to her!

"Great then!" Pete breathed a sigh of relief. He didn't think now would be a good time to mention it, but the only reason he had been able to get over Chloe was that he had fallen for Lana. Maybe, just maybe, she felt the same way too, but he would have to find out some other time, maybe tomorrow? "Well, I guess we better get some sleep. We have a long. fun day planned tomorrow!"

"Good idea, Pete." and with that, Lana and Pete quickly feel asleep.

Over that weekend...

Things turned out well for everyone that weekend, Predictably, Clark and Chloe frequently snuck of together in order to explore the amusement park, eat (mostly Chloe) and, well, make out in out of the way places. Pete and Lana were okay with that though because it gave them chances to be alone together. Eventually, they got to talking about how they had gotten over their old crushes so fast, and one thing led to another. By the end of the day, they had snuck in a couple of make-out sessions of their own. Lana decided she wouldn't tell the voice in her head to shut up anymore. Although things were a little more awkward for them that night at the hotel, the decided to take things slow and just get some sleep. However, they had decided that they were most definitely a couple now, and they would tell Clark and Chloe on Monday. Or Tuesday...As it turned out, school was canceled that Monday, and both couples got to spend some time alone that day. Furthermore, much to Clark's (and Chloe's) delight,between her time at the carnival and her feeding sessions with Clark on Monday, Chloe had put on another ten pounds! Deciding that her body was getting used to eating more, Chloe decided to up her food intake even more! By the end of he next month...

(note from supercode: in case you were wondering, the Jakelburg in this chapter is fictional)

By the end of the next month, Chloe had put on a whooping 20 more pounds! Even Chloe was amazed at how fast she was gaining weight now! In the past, she had never considered herself very susceptible to peer pressure, but her growing appetite(and body) were clearly evidence that the blond haired teenager had been subconsciously suppressing her appetite for food for years. She was sure glad that was over! Since her discovery of Clark's fat-loving tendencies had given her an excuse to indulge herself, Chloe had gained over 30 pounds in record time...and she couldn't be happier. Obviously, she had known that Clark would like her gain, but Chloe was surprised at how much she was enjoying it too! Chloe found that she really enjoyed eating whatever foods she wanted, fattening or not, whenever she wanted, and she was surprisingly enjoying the feeling of her softer, expanding form almost as much as Clark was! At first, Chloe had been afraid that her dad would try to step in and put her on a diet, but that had not happened. Although he had been concerned for his daughter when she had suddenly started overeating and putting on weight, he had left it alone when Chloe had explained to him that she was perfectly happy and was actually enjoying the results of her new eating habits. Although he did not understand that one bit, Chloe's dad just chalked it up to "another teen faze" and left Chloe alone. Secretly, he was a little relieved. After all, he wasn't a small guy, and if this meant Chloe wouldn't get on to him anymore on the rare occasions he cheated on his diet, he was all for it!

So, Chloe was dating Clark, Pete and Chloe were okay with that, and both Clark and Chloe were enjoying Chloe's new eating habits and growing body. Chloe's life should have been perfect, except for two things...

First, some of her meaner peers at Smallville High were starting to tease Chloe about her weight, calling her names like "Fatty", "Piggy" or other "original" taunts that betrayed their limited vocabularies and intellect. Of course, Clark, Lana and Pete always had her back, and Chloe had never been bothered too much about what people thought of her. Still, it was extremely annoying when people started snorting in front of Chloe when she ate a snack or her daily big lunches at school.

The second problem bothered her more. Although Chloe loved Clark, and he seemed to be very attracted to her, Chloe was really starting to be bothered by Clark's bizarre comings and goings, and his constant inability to be where he said he would be...at least on time. Although she did not think Clark was, or would ever, cheat on her, she was still very irritated by these absences. Chloe had been Clark's girlfriend for more than 2 months, and she was starting to get upset by the fact that he wouldn't trust her enough to tell her what was going on. If she didn't find out what was going on soon, she would,,,Chloe just didn't know if things between her and Clark would work out...

However, something was going to happen today that just might turn things around. Today was a Friday, and Clark had asked her to meet him at his loft to tell her something very important! "Lana?"

Chloe was alarmed to see her raven haired friend standing over her. She sat up slowly, her big belly spilling into her lap and her breasts jiggling slightly as she adjusted her position. Chloe locked eyes with Lana, and then looked over the rest of her body...while Chloe had ballooned these past weeks; Lana looked as slim and toned as ever. Clark’s former love interest was wearing a black bikini which showed off every inch of her traditionally ‘perfect’ body. Chloe looked about twice her size now.

“Hey Chloe,” Lana smiled, kneeling down beside her.

“Uh…hey,” Chloe wasn’t really sure what to say. She and Lana hadn’t really spoken to each other since she had started dating Clark.

“I’ve been here for a while, but I wanted to catch you on your own,” Lana said. “I know since you started dating Clark I haven’t really seen much of you. To be honest, I still had some nagging feelings for him…”

“Oh…” Chloe said, somewhat surprised. “And…what about now?”

“They’re all gone,” Lana smiled. “Don’t worry, not that you’d have anything to worry about anyway, I’ve seen the way he looks at you. I’m glad you’re happy.”

Chloe was honestly relieved; she had half expected Lana to announce that she still had feelings for Clark, and that she wanted him back. While Chloe’s relationship with Clark was rock solid these days, having Lana announce some sort of desire for Clark would have complicated matters.

“Thanks,” Chloe said. “A lot’s changed in the past few months huh?”

Lana let her eyes drift down to Chloe’s pot belly. Chloe caught sight of this, and Lana quickly looked away. Chloe just smiled. “Including my weight,” she giggled.

Lana managed an awkward smile. “Oh uh…I wasn’t…I…”

“It’s okay,” Chloe said, stroking her belly absent mindedly. “I know I must look pretty different these days, but I’m happy with it.” She gave her belly a reassuring pat. “Happier than I’ve ever been with my body.”

Lana was still looking awkward.

“What’s wrong?” Chloe asked.

“To tell you the truth, when I saw you earlier, I was shocked,” Lana said. “But…every time I caught a glimpse of you after that, I actually envied you…you seemed to be having so much fun, eating what you wanted, proud of your body. Happy with your life, with Clark. And…well…”

“What?” Chloe raised an eyebrow quizzically.

“I’ve made a decision,” Lana said. “I want to gain weight.”

Chloe was amazed to hear those words come out of Lana’s mouth. Years ago, before her acquired her perfect, slim, sexy body, Lana had been chubby. She had lost all the weight, and remained in perfect shape ever since, doing all she could to maintain her figure.

“Lana…are you feeling all right?” Chloe asked, confused.

“Perfectly fine,” Lana said. “Do you have any idea how stressful it is maintaining this body?” She gestured to her flat stomach.

“But you’ve got a great body, why would you want to change it?” Chloe asked.

“Didn’t you feel better after you changed yours?” Lana asked.

Chloe shrugged. “Well…yeah, I guess I did, much better.”

“I’m not looking to become some immobile blog or something,” Lana chuckled. “I just want to let go for a while, get a little curvier, get a little belly…” She gestured to Chloe’s stomach, which was far more than a ‘little’ belly.

Chloe realised that Lana was serious, and if she wanted to join Chloe in her new overly indulgent lifestyle, then why not?

“Well if you need any help, you know who to come to” Chloe smiled.

Lana laughed. “You know, maybe you could give me a few pointers? If that’s okay with you?”

“Sure,” Chloe said, the idea of an ‘eating partner’ excited her. “Why don’t you come round to my place when we get back to Smallville in a few days, I’ll make sure we’ve got plenty of supplies in!”

Chloe and Lana giggled in anticipation of their gluttony. After talking for another ten minutes and catching up on the latest gossip, Lana went on her way, just as Clark emerged from the sea and walked up to Chloe, his body dripping wet.

“Was that…Lana?!” Clark asked, shocked.

“Yeah, I was surprised too,” Chloe said. “She’s visiting relatives up here.”

“I’m glad you two are talking again,” Clark said.

“Oh, we’ll be doing more than talking…” Chloe grinned.

Since her latest shopping trip, Chloe found her clothes far more comfortable.

Finally, the door bell rang, and an excited Chloe hurried to answer it. Lana was standing there, looking a little nervous, wearing leather pants and a black tank top.

"So, you hungry?" Chloe grinned.

Chloe didn't know that Lana had a "little" secret that she (Chloe) had innocently let out of the bag. For although both Miss Chloe Sullivan and Miss Lana Lang were born in Smallville Hospital just a few months apart, they attended different Elementary schools. So they never met each other until they were in the fourth grade. After Lana's parents were killed in the meteor storm, her mother's sister Nell was granted guardianship by the Family Court. Having never married and having no children of her own, Nell went WAY overboard indulging Lana's whims. The major one being a propensity to over-eat at every meal. Not wanting to loose control of her niece, Nell readily complied in every way listed. She even sent Lana to a child psychologist who after a few months study diagnosed why Lana was so desperate to grow so big. She still remembered that terrible day and somehow had gotten it into her head that her parents wouldn't have gone away [died] if Lana had been a bigger girl. So by the time they met Lana had become the petite-sized girl that Chloe knew.

However before THAT happened after 20 minutes of essentially non-stop eating by the two girls, Chloe suggested that they should see whose belly had grown bigger from their efforts. Also, Clark and Chloe's relationship will have changed some plot elements of the show. Hope you enjoyed reading this chapter as much as I enjoyed writing it!)

Twenty Years had passed since Clark and Chloe had been in high school, and a lot of things had changed. Clark had finally come to grips with his destiny and had been Superman for several years. Over the years, with lots of help from Chloe, Clark had managed to put all of the rogue Kryptonians and criminals that had escaped from the phantom zone and Krypton, including Doomsday and Zod, back into their extra-dimensional prison for (hopefully) all of time. Thankfully, Chloe had managed to split Jason Tegue off from Doomsday with Black Kryptonite first, and he was now safely locked away in a mental institution, working on his psychological issues. Lex was also sent into the Phantom Zone by Jor-El who (rightly) considered the Luther to be an extreme hazard to his son's well being. Furthermore, Chloe had become Watchtower for the Justice League (which Clark had named and now lead), a job which required a lot of technical skill but little in the way of physical exertion. That was a VERY good thing! After Clark and Chloe had gotten married six years after their relationship began (with Pete as the best man and Lana as the maid of honor), Chloe had gained an enormous amount of weight due to her own eating habits and Clark's encouragement, and she now weighed well over 500 pounds!

Of course, being that heavy had caused Chloe some logistical problems at first, as she outgrew clothes quickly and required large amounts of food to satisfy her always growing appetite! However, when Clark's grandfather sadly, but inevitably passed away, he gave the millions he had made while running his successful law firm to Clark, the only member of his family who had managed to stay in touch with him over the years. As terrible as that event had been, it did solve Clark and Chloe Kent's money problems, although they were too humble to flash their money all over the place. For a time, however, Clark and Chloe still worried about the possible health problems Chloe's weight might cause her in the long run. Thankfully, it turned out that Chloe's meteor related ability to heal also amped up her own body's immune system, keeping the newest Mrs. Kent happy and healthy regardless of her weight, fitness levels, or eating habits. In fact, she actually aged at an increasingly slow rate, and looked far younger than her friends Lana and Lois, who had married Pete and Oliver Queen, respectably. This was a fact not lost on Martha and U.S Senator Jonathan Kent (who was still alive since Clark had not had to choose between saving him and Lana!) at their yearly family gatherings, although they were too polite too acknowledge the fact out loud. Chloe still didn't know if she would live as long as Clark, who no longer appeared to age at all as his powers appeared to grow stronger, but she knew that her and Clark would have a long, happy (and in Chloe's case, fattening) life together!

Suddenly, there was a knock at the door. The three friends turned as one to see Lionel Luthor stalk into the room.

"Mr. Luthor?" Clark exclaimed in surprise.

"What do you want?" Pete asked, with more than little hostility.

"Oh, I just thought I'd pay a visit to my favourite high school paper," Lionel grinned. "You know I've always been an avid follower of your work Miss Sullivan."

Chloe, Clark and Pete glowered at him as he walked into the room, a sinister smile on his face.

"Well I can see you all want me to cut to the chase, so I'll make this simple..." Lionel's smile faded, and was replaced by an intensely serious expression. "I'm here because Miss Sullivan here has been caught sneaking around a top secret Luthorcorp facility."

Chloe swallowed hard. "I don't know what you're talking about," she said quickly.

Lionel gave a chuckle, then produced a file from inside his coat. He waved the file in the air mockingly for a moment, and then tossed it onto the desk in front of Chloe. "Go ahead, have a look," Lionel said.

Chloe nervously grabbed hold of the file and opened it up. Inside was a grainy security photograph of her, looking rather suspicious, outside of a Luthorcorp facility in the dead of night. She remembered the incident well; last week she had gotten a lead from one of her contacts inside Luthorcorp, who had told her that something strange was going on at a brand new, specially constructed facility on the outskirts of Smallville. Chloe had gone there alone, and attempted to get a look inside, but she had been unable to find an entrance. She had eventually given up her search, but she hadn't realised there was CCTV at the site.

"That could be anyone," Chloe said, although she knew it was a transparent lie.

"It could be, Miss Sullivan," Lionel agreed with a smile. "Which is why I haven't contacted the authorities, but if you are caught around one of my labs again, then there will be consequences. Am I understood?"

Chloe nodded.

"Good," Lionel said. "Always a pleasure to see you, Clark."

Clark gave Lionel a curious look as he turned on his heel and strode out of the room. Chloe breathed a sigh of relief as she watched him leave.

"Why didn't you tell us about this?" Clark asked.

"Clark, I can handle these things myself," Chloe protested.

"Obviously not, if you're getting caught on Luthorcam," Pete added sarcastically.

Chloe ignored him, as a thought occurred to her. Lionel had said 'lab' before he left, and wherever there was a Luthorcorp lab, there was something strange going on, something that Chloe wanted to know about.

"Did you hear what he said?" Chloe asked Clark and Pete. "He said that place was a lab, we have to go back there..."

"Chloe, did you hear a word he said?" Pete asked.

"Well, you can either let me go alone, or you can come and help me. Which one?" Chloe smiled mischievously. "Either way, I'm going back there tonight. Maybe I can find out what's really going on there..."

"Because now, I've got you guys to help me," Chloe replied.

Pete murmured something under his breath. Chloe was still on the lookout for the surveillance camera she had missed last time. Suddenly, she heard a bang, and smelled smoke. She looked up to see the hidden camera was on fire, with sparks flying off it.

"That's weird," Chloe said, exchanging a confused look with Pete.

"It must have...erm...short circuited or something," Clark said awkwardly.

Chloe gave him a suspicious look. It was a little too convenient that the camera had gone wrong at the exact moment they arrived, but she wasn't one to look a gift horse in the mouth. She lead the way forward, and, with the camera down, the three companions were safe to explore their surroundings.

"See if you can find a door or something," Chloe said, taking charge,

"I found something!" Clark suddenly called from around the other side of the building.

Chloe hurried round to find Clark and Pete pulling open a circular door.

Note: This story is set during the fourth season of the show.

Since arriving in Smallville, Kansas, Lois Lane had become increasingly annoyed by the weirdness of the small town - a weirdness which now seemed to surround herself, her cousin and one Clark Kent. After first arriving in the small town looking for her missing cousin, Chloe Sullivan, Lois had encountered a naked amnesiac Clark wandering around in a field, before the two of them had joined forces to find Chloe.

Since then, a number of other annoyances had occurred, chief amongst them was Lois' continued stay in Smallville due to the fact that her father was forcing her to finish high school there. Once she had done that, she was free to return to Metropolis University, but until then, she was staying in Smallville. The Kents had been kind enough to let her stay with them, and despite her frequent squabbling with Clark, it was an arrangement that had worked out pretty well - she got a free place to stay, as well as free meals.

Lois had also come to work for her cousin at the high school newspaper - The Torch, and while she had not been enthusiastic about journalism to start with, she was starting to enjoy it more as the days went by.

Lois entered the Torch office early on Monday morning, a freshly bought coffee from the Talon clutched in her hand. As she walked through the door, she found Chloe sitting at her desk typing away, and Clark sitting on the edge of the desk.

"I should have known you two would be here already," Lois said tiredly as she walked up to them.

"You know it wouldn't hurt you to arrive on time once in a while Lois," Clark said sarcastically.

"Yes well, unlike you Smallville, I actually have other places to be," Lois bit back.

Clark frowned, and Lois enjoyed her victory. Since they had met, both her and Clark had continued to antagonise one other, and generally find each other incredibly frustrating, and yet, she ended up spending most of her time with him.

"So, what's new in Smallville cous?" Lois asked Chloe, peering over her cousin's shoulder at the computer monitor. "Or should I say, what's weird?"

Chloe grinned. "It's been pretty quiet for once, but there are a few things that might be worth reporting...there's a new factory opening up on the edge of town that's going to be making all sorts of tasty food products and something about a chemical leak into the river from a Luthorcorp plant. Anything take your interest?"

Lois considered...
